HA_HOTELNAME: luxury mountain villa with stunning pacific view - breakfast included
REVIEW_TITLE: spectacular view and all the comforts of home
Sentence: The power went out once during our seven day stay
Verbatim:
The steep trip up the mountain in our rented 4x4 was worth it as we found ourselves in a luxurious and comfy home with likely one of the most spectacular views in the area of Ojochal. Steve and April were quick to get back to us with any concerns or questions when booking and planning our trip. April went above and beyond with sending us pics of the road up to the home as I was concerned about finding the place arriving at night. Once there (which wasn’t difficult to find) Flora and Toño made our stay comfortable and homey with full hearty breakfasts each morning and kept the home comfortably clean and organized. They too answered any questions we had via google translate.
As you can imagine, we spent most of our time outside on excursions or around the luxurious poolside that included a hot tub for the cooler nights and cabana with BBQ etc for outdoor dining. Not that we needed a BBQ being minutes to Ojochal - the known foodie area of Costa Rica with a plethora of exceptional restaurants. At approx 2000’ above sea level we were comfortable enough not to need air conditioning, however they had it if we wanted it. The only thing I wish we had was screens to keep the doors and windows open at night as the cool breeze was lovely and i much prefer it over air conditioning. The power went out once during our seven day stay, but within seconds their backup generator came on, leaving the cityscape dark while our lights and amenities remained fully functioning. Although the birds, small lizards and butterflies were plentiful, we didn’t see much else, likely due to all the dogs in the area, barking at anything that would come near the property. Even though we loved the dogs, this could be a deterrent if you you don’t. If you are planning a trip to the quiet South Pacific area of Costa Rica where flora and fauna abound and want an incredible view and luxurious home with large pool area you should definitely check this home out. Would I stay at this place again? - in a heartbeat.

HA_HOTELNAME: lux condo w/views, htd pool, priv. beach, golf cart, kayaks, as seen on hgtv
Sentence: Only reason there are not 5 stars is that we lost power 4 different days.
Verbatim: One of the prettiest beaches on the island! Our unit 1A was very clean and nicely decorated. It was fun to drive the golf cart to the beach. Only reason there aren’t 5 stars is that we lost power 4 different days. A generator would be nice!

HA_HOTELNAME: pebble beach house for magnificent ocean & perfect golf, on the old 17 miles dr.
Sentence: The power went out the first night we were there but Roger the property manager brought us up a cooler to put our food in until the power was turned back on which was very well appreciated.
Verbatim: Location of the home was wonderful. It fit our needs. The power went out the first night we were there but Roger the property manager brought us up a cooler to put our food in until the power was turned back on which was very well appreciated. I do wish that there was some type of a fireplace access inside the home, but there was a small gas fire pit outside which was lovely and we enjoyed it every day. Overall the stay was wonderful and it was very well priced for the type of home that we had

HA_HOTELNAME: 1 mile to ski at palisades * dog friendly * pool table
Sentence: Everything was good, except that there was a power outage and we were without heating for almost 48 hours.
Verbatim: Everything was good, except that there was a power outage and we were without heating for almost 48 hours. The property manager only recommended us to light the fire, not very attentive. We had to sleep beside the fireplace because it was freezing inside the house

HA_HOTELNAME: 5-star | historic, peaceful, dog-friendly
Sentence: We “survived” the power outage just fine as it was restored within a couple hours.
Verbatim:
They did SUCH a great job with this house. It’s so well decorated and READY for guests - you’ll see what I mean when you stay. Everything is labeled with directions and it truly seems like they thought of everything. 

Only issue we had was the power went out and with young kids we were nervous about it getting too cold and their milk/food spoiling. Apparently this is an issue in this area bc we heard the neighbors generator turn on immediately. Unfortunately, the generator for this house was being installed on the Monday after we left, so we didn’t have that luxury, but future renters will have backup. :) We “survived” the power outage just fine as it was restored within a couple hours. 

The kitchen is a bit smaller than it looks in photos. just a heads up that it could get a little tight in there, especially for bigger people. 

Also, the 3rd bedroom is really a loft in the upstairs office and there’s a metal spiral staircase going up. We thought this would be where my 5yo would sleep until we saw the spiral staircase. That made us nervous if he got scared or woke up in the middle of the night. Luckily, there was an air mattress with all the necessary linens that he could use instead. The loft might be ideal for kids, but probably better for older kids (middle school to college-aged, IMO). The ceiling is slanted and I don’t know if you could stand straight up there to be honest. 

All in all, it was a great place to stay. We felt comfortable in the home, it was a great location, and we’d definitely stay here again.

HA_HOTELNAME: 5-star | historic, peaceful, dog-friendly
Sentence: Only issue we had was the power went out and with young kids we were nervous about it getting too cold and their milk/food spoiling.
Verbatim:

HA_HOTELNAME: incredible location with beach and ocean panoramic views, this home has it all !
Sentence: The house has a Generac backup generator which did not turn on when the power went off.
Verbatim: We spent a week at the beach in January in our second visit to this beautiful home. There are not a lot of stores or restaurants open but it is wonderful to be at the seashore at that time of year. However, winter in Maine can be tricky. We experienced a snow/ice storm which resulted in an area-wide power outage. The house has a Generac backup generator which did not turn on when the power went off. We contacted Olivia who immediately contacted an electrician and boiler repairman. We felt lucky that these very busy tradesmen were able to come over soon and remedy the problem, particularly since much of the area remained out of power for up to several days. Putting that experience behind us, we enjoyed a very peaceful stay and are grateful to Olivia for her prompt efforts to help us. We would not hesitate to stay here again.

HA_HOTELNAME: the chickaree cabin at mt rainier (166)
Sentence: Unfortunately, the power went out the night we stayed here
Verbatim: It was a very cute little cabin! The hot tub was a nice touch. Unfortunately, the power went out the night we stayed here and the generator was unable to be turned on. But other than that, it was great little get away!

HA_HOTELNAME: ocean view jungle villa pool jacuzzi fibre optic near beaches concierge service
Sentence: We had power outages every day, but it was only out for 1 or 2 minutes a day.
Verbatim: We used Nacho for Airport transfer from SJO. We would recommend that for those that have never driven in Costa Rica before. We rented a car from Uvita the next day. The roads are steep and curvy but very passable in dry season. The villa is better than the pictures can capture. We were mostly here to see the jungle and birds, wildlife etc. We were pleased with what all there is to see right from the deck. We had monkeys on the deck rail 2 out of the 7 days! Toucans, Aracaris, Tanagers, Honeycreepers, and many more other species daily. The gardener showed a sloth and its baby to us one day in a tree beside the parking area. So cool! Very friendly and helpful service personnel were there upon our arrival. We had power outages every day, but it was only out for 1 or 2 minutes a day. However, I think a back-up generator was being installed while we were there. We had a problem with the pool but Nacho and Lucie were very quick to remedy that even on a weekend. If you are looking for 1st class location and villa this will not disappoint. We would book this again without hesitation if we have the opportunity. Thank you, Lucie and Cameron, for sharing your piece of paradise with our family.

HA_HOTELNAME: join a pleasant, peaceful, an available owner,
Sentence: Maison très propre et confortable, nous n' avons pas souffert des coupures d' eau et d' électricité
Verbatim: La propriétaire vous accueille avec le sourire et de gentilles attentions. Maison très propre et confortable, nous n'avons pas souffert des coupures d'eau et d'électricité car tout est prévu pour. 10 mn en voiture de sainte anne et c'est la baignade dans une eau claire. Nous recommandons cette location.

HA_HOTELNAME: private | lg. 4b | free resort access incl.| parking | tennis| pay plan etc
Sentence: Power was a bit spotty and went out a few times.
Verbatim:
Overall unit was as described. Power was a bit spotty and went out a few times. 

Kitchen was very well equipped. The unit could use some love on the maintenance side of things. Overall I would stay there again

HA_HOTELNAME: spacious townhome - short walk to beach!
Sentence: Host was quick to respond when we had a random power issue.
Verbatim: We absolutely enjoyed our stay. Loved that there were toys there for my son. Host was quick to respond when we had a random power issue. Overall great experience!

HA_HOTELNAME: t2 any comfort for 2 people in family residence, calm and raised
Sentence: chemin d' accès en grosses pierres non égalisées premier jour coupure de courant pendant 2 heures, meme pas une bougie sur place??
Verbatim:
chemin d'accès en grosses pierres non égalisées
premier jour coupure de courant pendant 2 heures, meme pas une bougie sur place??

HA_HOTELNAME: bird watch @ land's end with amazing views of the harbor and pacific ocean
Sentence: The first night, 1:29 am, to be exact, all power went out in the entire Bodega Bay area due to fallen trees and branches.
Verbatim: We cannot say enough about how wonderfully both the owner and the local property manager handled things during our stay during the recent “atmospheric cyclone” in Northern California. The first night, 1:29 am, to be exact, all power went out in the entire Bodega Bay area due to fallen trees and branches. The owner and manager gave us directions immediately about emergency supplies and we really appreciated the wall-outlet flashlights that lit up immediately when the power failed, We were able to light the gas stove with matches, so we had tea while we enjoyed the storm. The propane fireplace worked, as well, so we were warm and cozy. The next morning, Erika called to see how we were doing and asked the local rep to bring new flashlights and a butane lighter for the stove, The power was out for 22 hours, but we enjoyed every minute. The rest of the week was rainy, and Erika texted us each day to see how we were doing. Beds were comfy, the kitchen perfectly provisioned and the views both peaceful and spectacular, We shall return for retreats as often as possible,

HA_HOTELNAME: the "howling wolf"  a cozy, ski chalet with private hot tub. ski in/out.
Sentence: During a freak accident that caused a power outage throughout the mountain, Paul and Vivien came and dropped off torches and flashlights for us, without us even asking.
Verbatim:
Our group of 8 had an amazing stay. Vivien and Paul were super helpful, and responded to any questions we had right away. 
The chalet was fully equipped, and with ski in/ski out access it was the perfect spot for a weekend at Big White. 
During a freak accident that caused a power outage throughout the mountain, Paul and Vivien came and dropped off torches and flashlights for us, without us even asking. They were amazing hosts. 

Thank you Vivien and Paul, we had an amazing trip!

HA_HOTELNAME: lux condo w/views, htd pool, priv. beach, golf cart, kayaks, as seen on hgtv
Sentence: Only reason there are not 5 stars is that we lost power 4 different days.
Verbatim: One of the prettiest beaches on the island! Our unit was very clean and nicely decorated. It was fun to drive the golf cart to the beach. Only reason there aren’t 5 stars is that we lost power 4 different days. A generator would be nice!

HA_HOTELNAME: the pineapple express
REVIEW_TITLE: noisy apt and poor communication during stay
Sentence: The power for the TV, Internet, and Fridge all went out on my 4th day.
Verbatim: This unit's bedroom is right beside TWO noisy elevators. The building is old so these are two very noisy clunky elevators. I bought ear plugs to "survive" my 5 night stay. The power for the TV, Internet, and Fridge all went out on my 4th day. Turns out that the breaker panel is in the hallway - I ended up resetting the breakers myself - but it's crazy to have a breaker panel that any tenant could meddle with in an open hallway. On my last day there I was given a new code to open the main entrance door to the building. The explanation to use the new code was totally inadequate - I ended up standing out in the cold for 10 minutes at 12:45 am while trying to figure out how to get into the building. I ended up having to WAKE UP the superintendent to get into the building. Not a happy experience. The unit had a nice clean bathroom, the bed was comfortable and the kitchen had "barely adequate utensils which were all very old and very well used. I would not trust Tanor to rent me any of his other units - this was overall a very annoying and unsatisfactory experience.

HA_HOTELNAME: stylish penthouse with ocean views and beach access
Sentence: We ran into a couple issues the first day due to a city-wide power outage as the generator did not kick in right away.
Verbatim:
We ran into a couple issues the first day due to a city-wide power outage as the generator didn't kick in right away. Property manager was very responsive and helped us work through everything. I cannot express enough how great the property manager was!
Beds were very comfortable, but there was only one thick/firm style of pillow that will not work for stomach sleepers.
Pool or ocean are both a 5 minute walk away. And you are in walking distance to a few different restaurants. Twisted Lime was my personal fave. Just make sure you aren't starving before you get to the restaurant as service is quite a bit slower than we are used to in Canada. 
NOTE: Bon Vivants cafe and cocktail bar is directly below the primary bedroom. If you are an early to bed person, this would be an issue due to the late-night noise. However, we didnt understand hurricane doors - you have to pull the handle up to make the door shut properly. We didn't figure this out until midstay, which lessened the noise.
We went with our two children, 10 and 12, and felt quite safe. 
You can take the #10 bus to downtown Nassau. Route goes along the coast and is about a 20 minute ride. Bus can be caught anywhere on the side of the main road by flagging them down. And when you want to get off, just say "bus stop". Fare is $1.50 per person. NOTE: Do NOT take the #10A is this route winds inland and takes significantly longer. Cabs were more expensive than we were expecting, and they charge additional for more than two people ($50 to downtown one way for 5 people).
Overall, a really great place to stay, but everything was significantly more expensive than we were expecting in the Bahamas.

HA_HOTELNAME: style+space in sunny kona! full kitchen, private lanai, wifi, tv, laundry kanaloa 1602
REVIEW_TITLE: bad management/communication, unclean unit and power outages
Sentence: On top of all that, the power went out the next evening while I was trying to get ready for a dinner party and had to use the flashlight on my cell phone in order to shower and get dressed, which was quite difficult.
Verbatim: This was of the WORST experience I have ever had through VRBO. Check in details were lacking, which resulted in me not getting into my unit until very late in the night, and once I did get in, I discovered the unit had not been cleaned since the last guest stayed there and there were also no sheets on the bed. This was very disappointing and frustrating given that I had been traveling and working all day and was exhausted by the time I got to the unit and then had to sit on the phone for several hours with VRBO reps trying to get the mess sorted out. On top of all that, the power went out the next evening while I was trying to get ready for a dinner party and had to use the flashlight on my cell phone in order to shower and get dressed, which was quite difficult. It's a shame that this was not better managed because the location and surrounding community were great.

HA_HOTELNAME: superb luxury villa 10 minutes away from the beach
REVIEW_TITLE: très belle maison, bien placé bien équipé, l’accueil est très agréable et la propriétaire elle l’éco
Sentence: On est obligé de fermer les volets si on peut pas avoir les moustiques si il y a des coupures d' électricité alors là à part ça tout était parfait
Verbatim: Le seul des grands agrément que j’ai pu constater à cette maison, c’est le manque les fenêtres ce qui fait que le soir on peut pas juste fermer la fenêtre. On est obligé de fermer les volets si on peut pas avoir les moustiques si il y a des coupures d’électricité alors là à part ça tout était parfait

HA_HOTELNAME: *high season specials* exceptional beachfront 2br condo in cupecoy/private beach
Sentence: The screen on the bedroom sliding glass door to the balcony was trashed, so we could not open it for the lovely breeze that is available in the evening & also for air when the power went out!
Verbatim: Property was a bit worn from comparison with the pictures. The property description proclaimed there were lounge chairs on the balcony overlooking the sea, when in actuality there were 4 plastic, hard, upright chairs that were not at all conducive to relaxation & a half-broken wooden table to place your drink on! We would have liked to spend more time on the balcony, but the chairs were too uncomfortable. The balcony handrails were all rusted and needed repair, while the neighboring condo rails were in great shape. We were allowed in early to enjoy the pool/beach, as the cleaning lady knew she had to work well after 5PM to make it right for us from the mess left behind from the previous renter. She was super! There were dirty dishes left in the dishwasher undone, & a frying pan with food still attached was found in the oven. We had to clean all the utensils, pots, & dishes that we wanted to use before we could use them. There was minimal TV service, & were told upon check-in that we would have to have our own subscription to Hulu, or Netflix etc, which we don"t subscribe to. This needs to be addressed in the description of the property for those without subscriptions, as internet service was our only access to outside news - when it was working. The screen on the bedroom sliding glass door to the balcony was trashed, so we could not open it for the lovely breeze that is available in the evening & also for air when the power went out!- which may have been a blessing since there were 2 stray cats that took up residence on our 1st floor balcony during the night. The master bath shower area is cave-like & really needed a power vent to remove the moisture, but that was broken. The stove top is barely working, as the touch pad is so worn it is difficult to adjust the temperature & to turn on & off. The paint on the ceiling is peeling off in the common kitchen area, & the refrigerator water/ice machine with the filter is inop so no potable water. The condo has the absolute BEST location in the entire complex with direct access to the pools & the beach is just steps away. Good parking is available close to the front door & is by gated access only with guard 24/7. This poor condo needs some TLC and it would be absolutely awesome!! We enjoyed St Maarten and this building location gives easy driving access to both the French & Dutch side restaurants, and the airport, while providing a very peaceful & restful atmosphere. Just needs a little TLC!

HA_HOTELNAME: emily's inn a beautiful private setting with pretty mountain views
REVIEW_TITLE: nice property when you have electricity & water...
Sentence: We went to Stowe on Dec. 23 and found that many businesses had experienced a power outage also and were closed.
Verbatim:
My family and I stayed at this property over Christmas. It is a nice house - when the power is on. A major storm came through and the power was out for 34 hours (from Dec. 23 - 10:00 pm Dec. 24). It is bad enough not to have electricity for that long (the sun went down around 4:30 pm and came up around 7:00 am), but even worse, at this house you don't have water when the electricity is out. That means that you can't flush toilets, shower, or cook. 

We got in touch with the owner about the electricity and she was responsive and communicated with local authorities about it. She kept in touch with us. We were told at least 5 times that the power would be on 'soon' but it didn't happen. 

We went to Stowe on Dec. 23 and found that many businesses had experienced a power outage also and were closed. We had no choice but to use the bathrooms at the house, even though they couldn't be flushed. We spent the night of Dec. 23 by the fire trying to keep warm and woke up on Christmas Eve hopeful that the power would be on 'soon' and we could enjoy our vacation. It didn't happen and we spent most of the day in the house with toilets full of excrement. My husband finally got some snow, melted it on the stovetop (which is gas), and put it in the toilet tanks to allow us to flush the toilets. This process literally took hours to be able to flush all four toilets. We ended up renting one hotel room (there weren't many options on Dec. 24) so my 79-year old father could sleep in a warm room and we could all take a shower and use a toilet that flushed! The owner said she would pay for the hotel room, but we had prepaid for it, and she didn't refund any of the money to our credit card.

Regarding the property itself, it is a nice, spacious house. However, furnishings are pretty outdated, some things do not work well, and the lighting is low in most rooms. For example, the shower head in the master bedroom had a hard spray that could not be adjusted, so I took my showers in the bathroom by the hot tub. The couch in the game room is uncomfortable because you slip off the cushions and the cushions don't stay in place. The game room is nice but there aren't any comfortable seats. Be aware that it is 10+ minute drive to downtown Stowe and a 20+ minute drive to the mountain. 

Would I recommend this property? IF the electricity is working, I would rate it a 4. If you stay here, pray that the electricity does not go out!

HA_HOTELNAME: 3759 pacific grove retreat ~ walk to aquarium, cannery row and downtown!
Sentence: Good provisions for power outages.
Verbatim:
Mid-century modern home with well-chosen furnishings. Spacious living areas and kitchen with facilities for entertaining. Library, piano, guitar, games, and internet provided activities for rainy days. Private front courtyard, and deck with BBQ. Laundry in basement through garage. 
Good provisions for power outages. Good supply of linens, towels, and basic provisions. Only negative: King size mattress needs replacing.

HA_HOTELNAME: gray manor - deer run manors
Sentence: Propane fireplace saved us when the power went out.
Verbatim: Nice little cabin in a safe location near most popular sites. Bring your own entertainment: cards, books, DVDs. Most cases do not have movies in the DVDs that are supplied. Propane fireplace saved us when the power went out. Would stay again.

HA_HOTELNAME: heavenly views and private pool
Sentence: Only had one day that electricity went out.
Verbatim: Place was awesome view. We will miss it. Just enough space for two. We elected to have joy meet us to show us how to get there. She was big help. The pool is salt and not heated. Was bummed about that. Spacious deck for both sun and shade. We were there for two weeks. Only had one day that electricity went out. Place has back up generator. But when electric goes out whole island so does wifi. So we went to beach that day. If u rent a Jeep from st Thomas and ferry over on car barge. Make sure u get on same company going back. There are more than one. And if u get on wrong one u will pay extra. Definitely need a Jeep if u are going to do any driving around island. Beaches are awesome. Trunk beach is world famous but I think I liked cinnamon beach better. They both have restrooms,showers, restaurants, drinks, souviners. Maho beach has all but showers. Those 3 beaches are best ( my opinion). U have to pay 5,00 pp at trunk bay to get in. All have small parking. So get there EARLY to park.all roads are hilly winding curves. For Some may be challenging or others fun. Gas / hot deli / grocery store mid way from Cruze bay to coral bay is good. We did a lot of driving around and packed a lunch. We had a great time and would go back. AWESOME VIEW.

HA_HOTELNAME: rock squirrel: cute and cozy one bedroom in the upper canyon!!
Sentence: Our power went out, and as soon as I text the owner they were over in minutes to fix the problem!
Verbatim:
My stay was amazing, it was a romantic getaway! 
The owners of cabin are always in touch, they are there if you need anything! Check in process was very easy! 
Our power went out, and as soon as I text the owner they were over in minutes to fix the problem! 
Bed was so comfortable, living room was relaxing, amenities were great! 
Gas stove, and bbq grill were great! 
I would definitely come back!

HA_HOTELNAME: the grey escape - cozy farmhouse w/ 3 king suites + loft near atv/utv trails
REVIEW_TITLE: we stayed during christmas and it was a great escape!
Sentence: The town near us lost power and some places lost water.
Verbatim: We stayed during Christmas 2022 and there was freezing temps. The town near us lost power and some places lost water. We didn’t have any issues affect us but the property manager communicated quickly and went above and beyond our expectations. This was a great place for my family and we loved the separate spaces to escape the young kiddos that came with us 😃would absolutely stay here again!!

HA_HOTELNAME: by the sea - seaside paradise, newly renovated & furnished
REVIEW_TITLE: nice view and bedding - poor water/power/wi-fi and rocky beach
Sentence: The power went off intermittently 3-5 times per day.
Verbatim:
Some pros and cons:

1. Stated in description kid friendly sandy beach: The beach is not a kid friendly swimming beach. It is very rocky. Make sure to have water shoes. While you can snorkel in the water, it does not have a lot in the direct area to offer for habitat or viewing. 
2. The dishwasher didn’t drain making it unusable. Upon arriving it had standing putrid water and dishes in it. We ran it and it leaked so we washed by hand the trip.
3. The water pressure was minimal at best. Even rinsing dishes and showering was hard with no pressure - not uncommon to have such low pressure it dripped. 
4. Upon arrival there was half a roll of toilet paper and a clogged toilet. With the poor water pressure this was a continuous obstacle. 
5. The paddle board had a slow leak and the kyak had a hole. This became a safety concern as children were out in the ocean with sinking equipment. 
6. Wi-Fi was sporadic. Regularly needing to reset the router. It worked as long as only one device was being used but not for streaming or large downloads. If needing Wi-Fi for work, I would recommend getting a backup.
7. The power went off intermittently 3-5 times per day. While this is a common issue on the island, there was no back up generator. If needing to use a CPAP or other critical devices, you will want to bring a secondary power source.
8. Upon leaving there were no instructions besides taking off linens. Which we gathered. We did not sweep thoroughly and they charged a significant fee with a picture of the few things that were swept up. We had left a recycle box because we looked for somewhere to recycle and couldn’t find one and charged over $200 for additional cleaning fees. 

Pros: 
- the view is fantastic
- The washer and dryer work fine 
- Volleyball net is a plus (volleyball was flat without something to pump it up)
- Local dogs are kind and friendly 
- Ac works well
- Screened patio is great for dinners
- While the beach is quite rocky, the beach deck provides a nice place to relax. 
- Beds were comfortable 
- Linens were comfortable and clean

HA_HOTELNAME: stemwinder 5 - can't beat the location of this spacious townhome! sleeps 11!
Sentence: Texted me the day of arrival to let me know about a power outage at the unit and then updated me through the day about the progress of getting it back on.
Verbatim: Located right off Powder Monkey lift just a short walk from the downstairs porch to the slopes. Has a wood burning fireplace with wood provided. Just bring something to help get it started. The managers are great to wok with! Texted me the day of arrival to let me know about a power outage at the unit and then updated me through the day about the progress of getting it back on. Were also quick to get back with me about staying an extra night! Will be looking to book this place for next year!

HA_HOTELNAME: live a unique and authentic experience
Sentence: Et Isabelle et Sylvain sont de super hôtes avec qui il est facile et agréable de communiquer, ils nous ont très bien accueilli à notre arrivée, nous ont donné de bons conseils pour notre séjour et ont été réactifs pour nous preter une lampe lors d' une coupure d' électricité !
Verbatim: La villa Kas ti Punch est un petit coin de paradis ! La terrasse ouverte avec vue sur la forêt est très agréable, l'emplacement est au calme et bien situé pour rayonner un peu partout en Guadeloupe avec une voiture. La maison est parfaitement propre avec tout ce qu'il faut pour cuisiner, des lits très confortables, et du matériel pour bébé qui a été très apprécié (lit avec moustiquaire, chaise haute, baignoire et même des jouets pour la plage et pour la maison). Et Isabelle et Sylvain sont de super hôtes avec qui il est facile et agréable de communiquer, ils nous ont très bien accueilli à notre arrivée, nous ont donné de bons conseils pour notre séjour et ont été réactifs pour nous preter une lampe lors d'une coupure d'électricité ! Nous sommes restés 10 jours et avons passé de superbes vacances en famille, merci encore pour votre accueil !

HA_HOTELNAME: inlet cottage - located at wilsons promontory
REVIEW_TITLE: lack of running water and loss of power!
Sentence: But when the power went out everything went to pot.
Verbatim: Yanakie was a very adequate house for our family. All the rooms were spacious with plenty of light. But when the power went out everything went to pot. With no power you have no running water, cannot drink (had to boil before drinking as well) water or use toilets. We lost food in the fridge because the power went out 2 times in 3 nights , 12 hours and 10 hours. The owners were responsive, but the write up did not mention the water business until we got our welcome/keys. Bring your own water if you go to Yanakie. Also, the fuse box is on the front of the house.

HA_HOTELNAME: inlet cottage - located at wilsons promontory
REVIEW_TITLE: lack of running water and loss of power!
Sentence: With no power you have no running water, can not drink (had to boil before drinking as well) water or use toilets.
Verbatim: Yanakie was a very adequate house for our family. All the rooms were spacious with plenty of light. But when the power went out everything went to pot. HA_HOTELNAME: monticello - blue bahia villa overlooking  a majestic view,ten bay, 10% off 2023
REVIEW_TITLE: more than the sum of it's parts.
Sentence: Another plus is that the house has a generator as do their other properties, so power outages will not infringe on your good time.
Verbatim: The house is so large we ended up using only the second floor. Decorated eclecticly, we were constantly coming across little interesting pieces and flourishes. I won't spoil it for you. One of our favorite spots was a private dining deck open to the bay. We ate most meals there. The private beach access made entering the bay effortless and if you take a short walk along the beach before sunset you can lay on the beach and watch it sink into the Caribbean. If you're a sunrise person the Atlantic beaches are a short distance away. Also our gratitude to Mr and Mrs Williams the caretakers who greeted us on arrival answered our many questions and helped with any issues. They were efficient, friendly and genuinely great people. We had a great time and felt very comfortable. Highly recommend and are planning to return. Another plus is that the house has a generator as do their other properties, so power outages won't infringe on your good time. I could go on, but as others have said it's a very special place. Lastly we would like to thank our hosts Barbara and Luciano for being so caring and helpful. We should have stayed longer.

HA_HOTELNAME: condominium 206 matapalo ideal for family trips and work online.
REVIEW_TITLE: privacy issues, cleanliness and multiple vrbo violations
Sentence: weather was great, so not sure why there was no power
Verbatim:
The power was not on the first couple of hours. Messaged the host but did not hear back. Eventually it came on. We arrived in the middle of the afternoon, weather was great, so not sure why there was no power.

There was not any shampoo, soap, laundry detergent, extra garbage bags (only 1 provided) nor directions where to put trash. There were hairs in the bedsheets. Host never emailed the wifi info beforehand as the platform clearly said should have been done, and we only get it several hours later after asking. 

On check out, host told me to message her directly on WhatsApp to reserve instead of the platform, a clear violation of VRBO’s rules and regulations. She then bombarded us with unwanted messages and solicitations afterwards. 

She also told us the 2 people before us mentioned they also had no direction where to put any trash either. And that they take care of it and laundry, when I told her we washed towels. Clean ones were in the dryer and ones that need to be washed were in the washer. This did not need to be done by us, but was done anyways. Despite this, host sent a picture of little pieces of unneeded papers afterwards. 

There was also a non disclosed video camera recording the unit which is also another huge violation of VRBO’s policies.

Inside home was nice, with a nice garden, however no view of the pool as listed in the description. 
 
TV in extra bedroom did not work properly, and cut out every 10 seconds to a black screen for 10 seconds. 

Host also tried to trick us into in earlier check out time than what was listed in the VRBO. Luckily I had a screen shot of the correct check out time. But, I should not have had to go through that. Host also asked us our arrival time at least 3-4 times beforehand even though we had already sent that info each time it was asked. Perhaps the messages in the platform are not read by the host.

HA_HOTELNAME: pet friendly! short walk to beach next to pier park
Sentence: We lost power because the owner forgot to pay the bill but they fixed it right away for us and had our electricity back on in no time.
Verbatim: Perfect location close to anything we needed and short walk to the beach. Pools were great. Lots to do here to keep the kids busy. We lost power because the owner forgot to pay the bill but they fixed it right away for us and had our electricity back on in no time. Kitchen looks way bigger in pictures than it really is but other than that, everything was great.

HA_HOTELNAME: escape to beach paradise & light house -the best for families & great for events
Sentence: We had a power outage which was taken care quickly and the generator worked quickly.
Verbatim: The place was awesome! It accommodated all of us and we had laundry facility on both floors. We had a power outage which was taken care quickly and the generator worked quickly. My guests were very pleased with location, we were celebrating our 50th Anniversary.

HA_HOTELNAME: tiny home on snowshoe creek & little wood lake (rv parking with power)
Sentence: The owner experienced a power outage at his residence during my stay and emailed and called with information, ways to stay warm and more.
Verbatim: I stayed with my two dogs in January 2023. I loved the hot tub, we all enjoyed exploring the trails and creek on the property. Peaceful and beautiful! The owner experienced a power outage at his residence during my stay and emailed and called with information, ways to stay warm and more. Luckily, either we weren’t effected or slept right through it, but he was very prompt with all the necessary info had I needed it! Hope to be back!

HA_HOTELNAME: central london 3 bedroom apartment
REVIEW_TITLE: a few issues (some possibly minor and one major)
Sentence: There is some kind of power fuse that can trip leading to power outage.
Verbatim:
The inside of the property was as pictured. The place is relatively clean and properly furnished (though there is no dining table).

Note that the property is on the main road with traffic a few feet from the property windows and so all traffic noise is heard. This may or may not be an issue for you.

Also, the upstairs residents move around with creaking floorboards starting at 3 am or so -- if you are light sleeper then that will be a concern.

On a separate note there is NO documentation of any sort in the apartment about how to use things. For example, for those from outside the UK there are no instructions on how to set the heating on the radiators. The television sound is controlled by a wall device that routes sound to ceiling speakers. There is some kind of power fuse that can trip leading to power outage. In each of these cases we had to reach out to the owners over the phone to get instructions. I do note that they did respond in each case on the phone and were helpful. However, it would be far simpler to just have some kind of NOTES for the tenants. A previous review had also noted this but we had not realized how much of an actual issue this could be. 

Finally the biggest concern is that the owners tried to charge us several hundred dollars after the fact for deep cleaning based on "smoking" inside the house. None of the family are smokers and so this was definitely not the case.

HA_HOTELNAME: brand new surf ranch bungalow
REVIEW_TITLE: don't let the photos fool you. beware
Sentence: #NAME?
Verbatim:
Listing photos look amazing and lots of things appear “pretty” but I had major issues from the moment I arrived until the moment I left. 

- I arrived on a Saturday, during a rain storm, to leaks in both master bedroom and living room (all over sofa). I immediately contacted owner who lives close by but instead of coming over to look, she instructed me to put pots out to collect dripping water and that a roofer would come by Monday. Monday it was fixed but she left the dirty leak collecting pots in the sink for me to clean myself. Had I been the owner, I would have left a bottle of nice wine and an apology note, not a pile of dirty pots for my renter to clean. 

- The dishwater is faulty and did not clean dishes, It would run, but the dishes were still filthy after a cycle. I am an adult and quite familiar with using dishwashers, the owner instead of coming by to see for herself decided to give me a lesson on how to work the dishwasher. Regardless, I can attest that after 5 cycles the dishes never got clean. So, I spent two weeks having to hand washing all the dirty dishes. 

- The power went out one night in the middle of the night and I had to contact the owner. Thankfully, it was restored fairly quickly but no utility contact/account info was given in her inadequate "welcome book", so I was unable to get updates as to when the power would return. 

- The garage door is controlled by a digital lock with code but the system is funky and gave me trouble a few times. Additionally the garage is very small. The front door digital lock with code is also difficult, it seems to time out and the only thing to do is wait 15 minutes for it to reset. I was locked out after midnight one night and the owner did not return my texts until 6am. This is a basic safety issue and for this reason alone the apartment should not be rented until it is corrected. 

- Finally, the washer and dryer are in a janky downstairs room which is very grimy. The washer/dryer is not listed in the "welcome book" forcing me to inquire (yet again) about their whereabouts and usage. 

- I travel and use short term rentals 6-8 times per year and this experience was pretty awful. Wendy the owner was “mostly” responsive but consistently condescending. She also offered no credit for any of the above issues. Well, she did offer to let me out of my contract a few days early but it wasn’t worth leaving at that point. 

- In conclusion, don't judge this book by its cover!

HA_HOTELNAME: pleasant house close to the beach and a shopping center
REVIEW_TITLE: globalement bon séjour avec un bémol
Sentence: Dommage que le gaz ne fonctionne pas car le soir il y a des coupures d' électricité.
Verbatim: Jolie petite maison en RDC avec une petite cour. La maison est bien rénovée et bien située. Elle est à 5 mn du carrefour market et 10 mn à pieds du port. Le quartier est assez calme et l’on se gare dans la rue devant la maison. Par contre pas de pression d’eau et pas d’eau chaude exepté un peu le soir. Attention sur l’annonce il est indiqué 2 toilettes mais un seul fonctionne et il est dans la salle de bain. L’autre est condamné. Nous avions choisi cette location pour avoir deux toilettes et avons donc été très déçus à l’arrivée. La plaque de cuisson comporte 2 feux gaz et 2 électrique. Dommage que le gaz ne fonctionne pas car le soir il y a des coupures d’électricité. J’espère que la propriétaire va résoudre le problème de toilette ou modifier la description de son logement.

HA_HOTELNAME: sandcastle inn #604 - beachcomber vacation homes
REVIEW_TITLE: clean and close to the beach.
Sentence: Unfortunately Oregon experienced a few power outages during my stay.
Verbatim:
Worked out fine. Unfortunately Oregon experienced a few power outages during my stay. So power was out for 15 or so hours. Nothing to do with the property. But the apartment held it's heat well so it was not uncomfortable.

All things you need for a short stay is in the apartment.

HA_HOTELNAME: ocean view house | short walk to tide pool, hot tub & pet friendly
Sentence: We had the temps in the house drop to 41 degrees during the night due to the power outage
Verbatim:
The house was as described.
For those booking with Vrbo in Sea Ranch, make sure your property management is VACASA not Grand Welcome.
We had the temps in the house drop to 41 degrees during the night due to the power outage and Grand Welcome was completely incommunicado. We placed 14 phone calls to them during our entire stay (Jan 3-Jan 7) and visited their office in Gualala, where the lights were on but the doors were locked.
They finally responded on Jan 19 to inform us that if we had any issues, they would have had to receive notice within 24 hours after leaving the premise.
Bad business. SMH

HA_HOTELNAME: ski in, ski out! cozy mountainside townhome at purgatory resort - edelweiss #7
Sentence: David was super quick to respond and resolve internet and cable issue following a power outage.
Verbatim: Fantastic setup and true ski in/ski out. Lots of thoughtful and functional details throughout made for a very comfortable stay! David was super quick to respond and resolve internet and cable issue following a power outage. We love Purgatory and had a great time!

HA_HOTELNAME: penthouse loft apartment, privacy only 10 mins to austin
REVIEW_TITLE: do not stay here, very deplorable conditions
Sentence: The 1st night we plugged in our small foreman grill which blew a breaker and we had no electricity until the “host” fixed it.
Verbatim: We tried to cancel before our arrival by calling Vrbo as we were worried about staying due to the very very cold and rude texts we received the day before checkin. We were very nice and courteous but this man has ZERO personality nor hosting skills. Vrbo called him he see if we could cancel due to our expressed fear (expressed to Vrbo representative) of staying at this property, she contacted him but he refused to refund our money and so did Vrbo even after expressing great concern for safety. We reluctantly decided to stay due to already paying. The “host” met us in the driveway and right off the bat after showing me where to park yelled at me when I tried pulling up in the driveway because he felt he needed to watch me park as to not hit the mailbox. Once taken to the door he opened it, told us to take our shoes off as his wife had just “vacuumed “ the bright pink carpet 30yr old dirty carpet, took us up to the “room” in which looked like we were in a converted attic and we actually laughed the 2 days we were there as if we had a 1st college studio this would have been it!! Very very old furniture (no legs on the purple couch, all furniture obviously from garage sales) but the worst was the 30+yr old mattress covered in plastic that was soooo hard and in such bad condition I could hardly walk after getting up both mornings. As far as the “room” it has no tv, we were told only to use a radiator plug in heater (ice storm/schools&county closed, 20 degrees at night) due to the “expensive cost of propane that heats the home”. With this being a converted attic it was brutally cold and that radiator heater is so very dangerous, had it caused a fire our exit would have been scary given we were in a home behind a broken steel gate that had to be opened/closed by hand upon arrival/leaving. The 1st night we plugged in our small foreman grill which blew a breaker and we had no electricity until the “host” fixed it. We then got a message saying to unplug the heater if we needed to use other power as it would happen again….not cool. The bathroom was a nightmare!!! Now “host” is saying the 30yr old bed was broken, which is a flat lie and charging us $1300! We should have trusted our gut instinct as we knew before even getting to the property something was off with this “host” and sure enough. He admitted to listening to us in our room in a text. We rent regularly and have had wonderful experiences with all other hosts. Very sad. I hope Vrbo does inspections.

HA_HOTELNAME: homewood by avantstay | amazing family cabin w/ hot tub & sauna
Sentence: Just wish they had more emergency equipment (working flashlights, lanterns, generator) as we lost power due to the snowstorm and only had a few candles.
Verbatim: Property was generally clean and well appointed. Great for larger group. Just wish they had more emergency equipment (working flashlights, lanterns, generator) as we lost power due to the snowstorm and only had a few candles. Thankfully we travel with flashlights. Otherwise great trip.

HA_HOTELNAME: apartment with swimming pool and private beach, with a separate bedroom
REVIEW_TITLE: conforme à la description, appartement très agréable, nous recommandons.
Sentence: un seul bémol, les places de parking insuffisantes (en pleine saison), les coqs qui nous ont réveillé trop tôt le matin et des coupures d' eau et d' électricité (les propriétaires n' y sont pour rien bien-sur).
Verbatim:
Super séjour dans cet appartement et dans cette résidence de vacances, où rien ne manque. très bon contact avec les propriétaires. un seul bémol, les places de parking insuffisantes (en pleine saison), les coqs qui nous ont réveillé trop tôt le matin et des coupures d'eau et d'électricité (les propriétaires n'y sont pour rien bien-sur).
Pour résumer nous sommes pleinement satisfaits de notre séjour et le recommandons.

HA_HOTELNAME: getaway to a quiet neighborhood house (mil suite) with garden & creek view
Sentence: the power went out in a portion of the kitchen and some outlets
Verbatim:
This is a good place to go if you have trips into the Seattle area but want to come back to a cozy, more relaxing setting. This MIL suite is at the lower portion of a house, with a fully separate entry. It was really good to have a level entrance with no stairs! The electric fireplace was nice, WiFi/Internet great, parking was great, and owner communication was great!

The listing said full kitchen and we used the dishes, silverware, pots and pans, tea kettle, toaster, microwave, and dishwasher. We did not use the countertop oven. I appreciated knowing that it was a small refrigerator ahead of time, as it helped in planning what to bring/not bring. The listing I believe did say a stove, which was one of the reasons I selected it. What was in the kitchen was 2 burner ceramic/glass stovetop, which even with a users manual was a bit confusing for me to use. However in communicating with the owner my questions were cleared up. It might have been helpful to have pictures of the kitchen to see what was included. 

The weather when we were there was cold for the Seattle area so we used the wall thermostat/heaters and the space heaters. However we were also cooking at the same time on the stovetop and heating water in a tea kettle and the power went out in a portion of the kitchen and some outlets. To his credit, when we contacted the owner he quickly remedied the situation. 

We did not use the sunroom, but did enjoy the view of the creek, chickens, garden outside, and evergreen trees.

HA_HOTELNAME: on the beach in moclips with hot tub, fireplace, bbq, patio, beach access & more
Sentence: A brief power outage was a bummer
Verbatim: We had a nice relaxing time. A brief power outage was a bummer, but an ocean storm is awesome.

HA_HOTELNAME: sonder at south congress | two-bedroom apartment w/ balcony
Sentence: Lost power for 16 plus hours.
Verbatim: Lost power for 16 plus hours. Contacted the property company via the app and eventually got an update that it was a city issue even though most of the apartments in our complex had power so not sure how it’s a city power issue when 85% of the complex had power. We went to the community area and stayed for 5 hours and the full time residents there were getting different updates as it was a building by building property issue. I don’t appreciate dishonesty. No heat, lights, or hot water for a very long time. Horrible experience.

HA_HOTELNAME: sonder at south congress | two-bedroom apartment w/ balcony
Sentence: Contacted the property company via the app and eventually got an update that it was a city issue even though most of the apartments in our complex had power so not sure how it is a city power issue when 85% of the complex had power.
Verbatim: Lost power for 16 plus hours. Contacted the property company via the app and eventually got an update that it was a city issue even though most of the apartments in our complex had power so not sure how it’s a city power issue when 85% of the complex had power. We went to the community area and stayed for 5 hours and the full time residents there were getting different updates as it was a building by building property issue. I don’t appreciate dishonesty. No heat, lights, or hot water for a very long time. Horrible experience.

HA_HOTELNAME: beautiful coastal cabin with ocean views, private deck, hot tub and bbq
Sentence: We had no power, heat or hot water.
Verbatim: On the morning of our first night in the home, the power went out. We had no power, heat or hot water. Property Manager was unable to confirm when it would be back on. We went and got food, heat etc until I watched the PGE website and saw the power appeared on in the afternoon. Drove back out to the property and the power was out. Property Manager came by, apologized and said I would be compensated. We left and went back home. I had paid for 3 nights but got one. I was only reimbursed $550 out of the $1400 I paid. I was told by the PM well the power came on at 4pm before the last night. As if we were going to go to a hotel and wait around for the power and pay for 2 locations. PGE website said the power was not coming back on until 10pm our last night so went back home. I have screenshots of the PGE website but the Vacasa LLC will not return my calls, VRBO said they would have them reach out to me but they never did. I have used VRBO for years and NEVER had this issue. This rental is the worst one out there. Be sure to check out all the fees. We paid for a hot tub we couldn't even use. It's ridiculous. Do yourself a favor and stay elsewhere! We thought visiting our college town renting a beach house for a birthday celebration would be amazing. It was not.

HA_HOTELNAME: beautiful coastal cabin with ocean views, private deck, hot tub and bbq
Sentence: On the morning of our first night in the home, the power went out.
Verbatim: On the morning of our first night in the home, the power went out. We had no power, heat or hot water. Property Manager was unable to confirm when it would be back on. We went and got food, heat etc until I watched the PGE website and saw the power appeared on in the afternoon. Drove back out to the property and the power was out. I have used VRBO for years and NEVER had this issue. This rental is the worst one out there. Be sure to check out all the fees. We paid for a hot tub we couldn't even use. It's ridiculous. Do yourself a favor and stay elsewhere! We thought visiting our college town renting a beach house for a birthday celebration would be amazing. It was not.

HA_HOTELNAME: just tee'd up: beautiful river strand town home with amazing golf course views
Sentence: However the biggest issue was that the power went out one day.
Verbatim:
We love River Strand and this unit is in a good location. However, be aware that this is a typical rental unit, with basic amenities, most of which were in working order. The carpets and lanai furniture require cleaning. A lot of the cookware is warped, so less efficient on the glass cooktop.
However the biggest issue was that the power went out one day. It took 5 hours of calling the property manager to figure out that the owner hadn't paid the electric bill of $233 and 2 more hours before the power was restored. Who does that to their tenant?
The price is also a bit steep, compared to the prices quoted by other renters.
So be aware of these issues before you book.

HA_HOTELNAME: skier's paradise! 2 min to heavenly nv side!! sleeps 5-6
Sentence: We were there for the massive 6 feet of snow and had a brief power outage, but out host was on it and very proactive.
Verbatim: Host is very helpful, very communicative and responsive. We were there for the massive 6 feet of snow and had a brief power outage, but out host was on it and very proactive. The place is very accommodating, lovely fireplace insert, kitchen well stocked, we would definitely stay there again!!

HA_HOTELNAME: tinkerbell house emerald island resort
Sentence: was not fully cleaned when we arrived but that was due to a power outage in the community.
Verbatim: Location was excellent! Easy to get around. The house was very comfortable. Wasn't fully cleaned when we arrived but that was due to a power outage in the community. We all enjoyed the pool. We would definitely book this house again if we come back to Florida!

HA_HOTELNAME: come enjoy the cooler weather in our cozy cabin in munds park!
REVIEW_TITLE: great cabin and even better hosts!!!
Sentence: While that was great for snowball fights it made it tough when power went out in the whole community.
Verbatim:
The cabin was perfect: easy to get to, easy to park (which is sometimes hard in Munds Park b/c a lot of the driveways are on a hill) and very comfortable. 

This was my kids first time in the snow and boy did they get their fill - we had a huge snowstorm while we were at the cabin. While that was great for snowball fights it made it tough when power went out in the whole community. Travis and Heather were GREAT in helping get me out - the snowplow had created a huge wall of ice that they helped dig me out of and got me on the road safely.

Definitely plan to rent the cabin again - just hopefully not with 4 feet of snow next time. 

Highly recommended!!!

HA_HOTELNAME: baker beach house - hot tub, ocean views & fire pit-
Sentence: There were instructions in the manual provided about what to do in the event of a power outage, but I am surprised that there is not a generator on the property if power loss is a regular occurrence.
Verbatim:
It is a lovely place tucked away in a private setting. We really enjoyed being there for a couple of days and would have loved to have been there for the rest of the week. Unfortunately, storms resulted in power loss for more than 30 hours, and after experiencing a full day of no hot tub, no laundry, no fridge, no oven, no hot water, etc., we had to make other plans because there was no indication the power would be restored any time soon. We left 1 1/2 days early.

There were instructions in the manual provided about what to do in the event of a power outage, but I am surprised that there is not a generator on the property if power loss is a regular occurrence. We did receive a partial refund (even though the contract does state that the owners are not liable for power loss, among other things), which we did appreciate. But unfortunately what we hoped to be a great week turned into a great couple of days, followed by a frustrating couple of days. Again, it is a lovely place, but maybe make sure you stay somewhere in the area that has a generator.

HA_HOTELNAME: appartamento
REVIEW_TITLE: sehr schöne fewo, direkt im zentrum
Sentence: Als wir einen kleine Stromausfall hatten haben wir sofort Hilfe bekommen.
Verbatim: Super gute Kommunikation mit den Gastgebern, hat alles reibungslos geklappt. Als wir einen kleine Stromausfall hatten haben wir sofort Hilfe bekommen. Sehr sauber, sehr gepflegt, alles da, was man braucht. Und das mitten im Zentrum. Rundum perfekt.

HA_HOTELNAME: cabin in hocking hills state park on 101 acres
Sentence: Power went out when someone hit a pole and Dana reached out right away to be sure we were taken care of.
Verbatim:
Second time we have stayed here and it's the best. Great place for a group of any age. Dana is an A + owner. Power went out when someone hit a pole and Dana reached out right away to be sure we were taken care of. 
Thank you for another great memory.

HA_HOTELNAME: live the beach life! stay in our fun & amazing townhome!
Sentence: Half of the electricity in the unit went out during our last night there.
Verbatim: The location of the property is great and easy beach access. Communication with the owner and access was easy and the owner response was rapid. The unit needs updating and repairs/painting. The doors and screens were very difficult to open and the furniture and beds were old and not very comfortable. Painting was definitely needed. Half of the electricity in the unit went out during our last night there. The electrical outlets and fuse box needs updating. As much as we enjoyed the location and beach access we would not stay there again unless it has been updated and repairs done.

HA_HOTELNAME: bertucci's country house
Sentence: the power went out
Verbatim: We had a wonderful stay and hated to leave. The weather was a little crazy with the heavy snow and the power went out but Nick made sure we had everything we needed and took great care of us. We can't wait to come back

HA_HOTELNAME: epic lake and mountain views from this private home!
Sentence: Right after she left, electricity went off in a few bedrooms and few bathrooms.
Verbatim:
We have a group of people (10) and we was expecting some livable conditions at the property, where we can relax and warm up after skiing/snowboarding. 
Check in was at 4 pm. However, property was absolutely not ready. It was less than 60 degree inside and it went up to 62 by 9 pm. Management was saying that it’s normal for this house. But, after checking the description of the property, I was able to convince management to save us from freezing. One of the associates was more helpful, she brought some heaters around 10 pm.
Right after she left, electricity went off in a few bedrooms and few bathrooms. Heaters was no option anymore for some people… Management couldn’t help us. After several calls, they was able to offer me “call next day to check on you”. Guess what? Nobody called! Also, they provided info about the breaker for electricity later. 
This is not it. Be ready for cold shower if you have more than 4 people in the house taking shower same day. Boiler is capable to preheat only 5 portions of water for shower. It’s not in the description also btw.
Property wasn’t absolutely clean. Very dusty. They will ask you ti take a trash 10 min from house (DRIVING!!) and they didn’t even provided a code to the gate. 
To summarize: I paid 6k for a house with no heat, hot water, where I have to clean shelves and take care of the trash. Nothing mentioned in the description. Useless management.

HA_HOTELNAME: guadalupe getaway | hip decor, comfortable, unique!
REVIEW_TITLE: great place but false promises - hot tub doesn't work
Sentence: 2) when power went out no guest access to reset router (which is needed and frequent power outages though short here), so hopefully owners will move to guest accessible area for future.
Verbatim:
Sadly I have to leave a poor review which mostly is directed towards the Grand Welcome Property Management Company.

First positives- place is in great condition/decor and great location, 24 on call property management was responsive during stay during power outage

Negatives- 
1) Biggest problem was advertised hot tub was NEVER useable and property managers knew this according to our conversations. I also have written texts from Grand Welcome employee stating will be compensated/reimbursed for nonuseable hot tub but this NEVER happened. I contacted Grand Welcome on VRBO website, text, phone - NO RESPONSE. I really didn't want to leave a bad review but this was poor follow through adn we had many other property options without hot tubs that we passed up for this place. 

2) when power went out no guest access to reset router (which is needed and frequent power outages though short here), so hopefully owners will move to guest accessible area for future. 
3) Not enough parking, only space for 2 cars in driveway and no additional street parking so another guest had to park in a grocery lot in town. 

Happy to take down my bad review if I get the refund for HOT TUB NOT WORKING.

HA_HOTELNAME: guadalupe getaway | hip decor, comfortable, unique!
REVIEW_TITLE: great place but false promises - hot tub doesn't work
Sentence: First positives- place is in great condition/decor and great location, 24 on call property management was responsive during stay during power outage
Verbatim:
Sadly I have to leave a poor review which mostly is directed towards the Grand Welcome Property Management Company.
