However, after this experience, coupled with the price gouging and managements complete lack of understanding or acknowledgment of any kind, I would recommend everyone steer clear of this property. The posting listed by management on VRBO is dishonest.

Ultimately, we were very unhappy with our stay and would urge everyone not to stay here, unless you want the theme of your vacation to be “disappointment.”

Again, my review: 0/10

HA_HOTELNAME: paradise in a secluded ocean view villa(private pool/hiking trails)
Sentence: The pool was not clean until the 6th day.
Verbatim: I don't even know where to start. I booked Welsey's home for 14 nights. We were traveling around Costa Rica and flexible with the location so when we found out the location was a different part of the country than shown on VRBO (near Nicaragua), we changed our transportation. We arrived at a new home that is not quite ready for guests. For the first 30 hours of our stay, we had no water. When we arrived, there was no power. There were bugs lining each of the entry points, used soap in the bathroom, and it hadn't been cleaned in a while. We received 2 rolls of toilet paper and no trash bags for our 2-week stay. Our taxi driver got stuck and had to be pushed up the hill. You have to cross (literally forge) 3 creeks to get to the house. For 5 full days of our 15-day stay, we were without water. Welsey did all that he could but the property management was horrible. The first time the water pump broke and it took 2 full days to fix. The second time a breaker went out on the water pump. There was literally no water on the day we checked out so we couldn't shower or wash our dishes. During the first five days of our stay, the pool was not clean. Multiple groups of people came out and walked around the house looking at it. This was not very private. Multiple times at night "security" would drive down and shine lights in the windows. The pool was not clean until the 6th day. Plus there are many tiles peeling off. Our two-year-old got a bacterial infection from swimming in the pool water. He was throwing up and had diarrhea for 7 days. The day he threw up, the water was turned off for 2 days. So we couldn't wash his sheets and there were no extra. The taxi cost is $90 one way to Tamarindo to the nearest supermarket and medical clinic- if you can get someone to drive out and pick you up. The doctor's visit and lab testing were $190. The pros were: the beds were comfortable, the pool was nice when we could use it, monkeys in the trees nearby, large high-pressure shower, and the house was new. The living room furniture was uncomfortable and there were no extra appliances like a blender and toaster. It seems blenders are common at vacation rentals in Costa Rica. We stayed all over Costa Rica for a month and a half and this was our most difficult stay. We were stuck out at this house with no car, a sick kid, and ran out of food. I would not stay here again and hope that the issues are fixed (like adding a water reservoir) before more guests are hosted.

HA_HOTELNAME: paradise in a secluded ocean view villa(private pool/hiking trails)
Sentence: Our two-year-old got a bacterial infection from swimming in the pool water.
Verbatim: I don't even know where to start. I booked Welsey's home for 14 nights. We were traveling around Costa Rica and flexible with the location so when we found out the location was a different part of the country than shown on VRBO (near Nicaragua), we changed our transportation. We arrived at a new home that is not quite ready for guests. For the first 30 hours of our stay, we had no water. When we arrived, there was no power. There were bugs lining each of the entry points, used soap in the bathroom, and it hadn't been cleaned in a while. We received 2 rolls of toilet paper and no trash bags for our 2-week stay. Our taxi driver got stuck and had to be pushed up the hill. You have to cross (literally forge) 3 creeks to get to the house. For 5 full days of our 15-day stay, we were without water. Welsey did all that he could but the property management was horrible. The first time the water pump broke and it took 2 full days to fix. The second time a breaker went out on the water pump. There was literally no water on the day we checked out so we couldn't shower or wash our dishes. During the first five days of our stay, the pool was not clean. Multiple groups of people came out and walked around the house looking at it. This was not very private. Multiple times at night "security" would drive down and shine lights in the windows. The pool was not clean until the 6th day. Plus there are many tiles peeling off. Our two-year-old got a bacterial infection from swimming in the pool water. He was throwing up and had diarrhea for 7 days. The day he threw up, the water was turned off for 2 days. So we couldn't wash his sheets and there were no extra. The taxi cost is $90 one way to Tamarindo to the nearest supermarket and medical clinic- if you can get someone to drive out and pick you up. The doctor's visit and lab testing were $190. The pros were: the beds were comfortable, the pool was nice when we could use it, monkeys in the trees nearby, large high-pressure shower, and the house was new. The living room furniture was uncomfortable and there were no extra appliances like a blender and toaster. It seems blenders are common at vacation rentals in Costa Rica. We stayed all over Costa Rica for a month and a half and this was our most difficult stay. We were stuck out at this house with no car, a sick kid, and ran out of food. I would not stay here again and hope that the issues are fixed (like adding a water reservoir) before more guests are hosted.

HA_HOTELNAME: paradise in a secluded ocean view villa(private pool/hiking trails)

Verbatim: I don't even know where to start. I booked Welsey's home for 14 nights. HA_HOTELNAME: comfortable sophistication in formosa gardens
Sentence: While decor is a little dated, no washcloths were available and the pool was green (we visited in January), it still served its purpose well.
Verbatim: Very nice home. While decor is a little dated, no washcloths were available and the pool was green (we visited in January), it still served its purpose well. Roomy and comfortable and very convenient to the parks. Nice, safe neighborhood and every chain restaurant or store you can think of is nearby.

HA_HOTELNAME: large lake view cabin 1 mile from the village w/ hot tub & game rm vrr2022-0770
Sentence: However, this time the hot tub was VERY dirty
Verbatim:
This was my second time renting this property because the first time it was so great. The house itself is nice, spacious, has a fenced yard, and good location. 
However, this time the hot tub was VERY dirty and there were beer cans around the yard when we arrived. 
We are not people to usually leave a review so we contacted the owner to let them know directly(with photos) and they never got back to us.

HA_HOTELNAME: 30 sandpiper - ocean breezes and sandy footsteps just moments away!
REVIEW_TITLE: ideal home for multi family gathering
Sentence: Amenities were great including bikes to borrow - although pool was very dirty (but that did not stop us from taking a cold plunge!)
Verbatim:
Location was great - close to beach and town. 

Amenities were great including bikes to borrow - although pool was very dirty (but that didn’t stop us from taking a cold plunge!) 

The Vacation Company service was the best part - every person we spoke to (including Fiona) was kind, thoughtful and attentive. I would highly recommend this home and this property manager. Top notch!

HA_HOTELNAME: downtown luxury villa 307 with hot tub & views - $500 free activities & equipment rentals daily
Sentence: the hot tub was filled with algae when we arrived and was not treated for two of the four nights we were there.
Verbatim:
The kitchen was really well stocked with appliances, dishes, bowls, etc and the best of any place we’ve stayed. 

The place was nice but the hot tub was filled with algae when we arrived and wasn’t treated for two of the four nights we were there. The management company was super responsive to my emails but correcting the issue was not as responsive. When the shower knob fell out, maintenance was out within several hours which was appreciated. 

Loved the standing desk and monitor in the master so nice of you do have to work a little while on vacation. 

Like some other vacation rentals in the area, you have to LOVE stairs as there are a LOT of them. The builder who thought a metal spiral staircase to the hot tub was clearly imbibing or enjoying from the green medical signs! No doubt they were trying to take advantage of space, but it’s a weird setup. 

I would suggest the owners put in a larger tv in the main floor as watching a football playoff game on a tiny tv was a little bit of a bummer. There is a larger one on the lower floor but not much seating. 

Minus the stairs, I think I would love this place a lot more outside of the winter skiing season. The driveway was tight with the snow but we loved seeing the bikes that could be used in non-snowing seasons.

HA_HOTELNAME: bear lake retreat-large luxury custom built home*hot tub*pool table*lake views
Sentence: We spent over 2k for this property and we just got $30 back despite the fact that we could not use one of the rooms at all plus dirty hot tub and sheets;
Verbatim:
I would never give a 1 star review but unfortunately I'm forced to do so because of the terrible customer service we received from Meredith Logging.
We picked up the cabin's key around 3:55 in the office and were told that the cabin was ready by the time we arrived. We arrived at the cabin around 4 and the person who was cleaning asked for 20 more minutes.
He did not let us unload and it was super cold so we headed to the starbucks. We came back around 4:40 and the cabin was not ready yet. 
Finally he left the cabin around 5 pm and let us in after 4 hours of driving & waiting. 
After turning on the heater we felt an unpleasant smell in one of the bedrooms on the third floor.
We opened the window, closed the door, contacted the office (5:50pm). They promised to send someone to fix it, but after exchanging messages they said they cannot send anyone till the day after. 
We rented this property just because of the number of bedrooms it has so we can have our privacy. But due to this issue two of us ended up sleeping on the sofa in the living room.
Beside this issue the hot tub was super dirty. We have also found most of the sheets with stains and many pillows without covers. I wore my jacket and preferred not to use the dirty blankets and sheets. It was very disappointing.
The day after around noon we stopped by at the office to follow up (since they send no one). The person who did not let us in on check-in day was there and he acted like all the sheets were clean and he was not aware of the hot tub issue until we showed him the photo. Then he acted like he was taking notes and he would send someone to fix the problems.
Finally around 5 pm on Saturday a maintenance team member showed up and he said he cannot fix the bad odor and hot tub shortly and promised to document the issues.
During the checkout, we mentioned again about our terrible experience and they said that someone from their refund team will contact us which they never did. So we followed up a couple times and they kept saying that someone will be in contact soon. Couple days passed and no one contacted us. We finally were able to get a hold of someone and they simply refunded us $30 for the hot tub only. We spent over 2k for this property and we just got $30 back despite the fact that we couldn't use one of the rooms at all plus dirty hot tub and sheets; very disappointing. 
I would definitely not recommend this property and any other properties Managed by Meredith Logging.

HA_HOTELNAME: a little cabin with hot tub in red lodge, montana.
Sentence: I was disappointed in the cleanliness of the hot tub... it was cloudy and had things floating in it and a lot of sand in the bottom.
Verbatim: Really cute cabin. Smaller than I thought it was going to be, but it worked for us. I was disappointed in the cleanliness of the hot tub... it was cloudy and had things floating in it and a lot of sand in the bottom.

HA_HOTELNAME: orlando vacation oasis - 7 bedroom near disney!
Sentence: But the carpet and walls were filthy and the pool never worked until the last day
Verbatim: House is in great location and big and airy. But the carpet and walls were filthy and the pool never worked until the last day

HA_HOTELNAME: lake front*100° heated pool year-round* hot tub
Sentence: Unfortunately, the hot tub was not working, (and had not worked in a while) and the pool was a little green.
Verbatim: I rented this beautiful property for a late Christmas celebration with my two daughters and their families. The living room was perfect for a wonderful afternoon of presents. The kids were very excited to swim outdoors in January and the adults were excited to hang out in the hot tub. Unfortunately, the hot tub was not working, (and had not worked in a while) and the pool was a little green. The doors, vents and corners were not clean and the overhead rain showerhead in the master bath did not have hot water. Otherwise, the rest of the property was accommodating.

HA_HOTELNAME: 4 bd luxury home ft lauderdale 15 mins fr beach
Sentence: pool was dirty due to a storm on prior fay
Verbatim:
The property was beautiful, pool, outdoor area to seat with a fire place. Rooms were roomy and spacious for everyone. 

Some issues were AC battery out on thermostat owner took a while to answer back and pool was dirty due to a storm on prior fay but someone was there but not in a sufficient time for us to be able to enjoy the pool. My other issue is that they need to disclose that you have to buy your own propane gas as none was available and we had to buy our own, than the grill needs to be updated as it was all rotted out so we couldn’t grill outdoor. 

The guest bathroom shower had hair on the wall and the stove burners some didn’t work, assure to inspect property to assure all is available and clean mainly the bathrooms.

Overall it was beautiful!

HA_HOTELNAME: the dolphin house by avantstay | walkable key west w/ bbq, pool & outdoor dining! | week long stays
Sentence: Pool was filthy.
Verbatim: House was very clean and well stocked. Pool was filthy. Pool man said it had not been cleaned in two weeks. It did get cleaned on Monday. Landscaper filled our trash can with tree clippings leaving no room for trash. All other cans were full with tree clippings. I ended up flagging down the trash company and they made an extra stop and emptied the cans for me.

HA_HOTELNAME: large family home - 5 min walk to patrolled beach- family and group friendly
Sentence: a good place to rest for a few days, but unfortunately the water in the pool was a bit dirty
Verbatim: The host was very nice and a good place to rest for a few days, but unfortunately the water in the pool was a bit dirty

HA_HOTELNAME: serendipity- pet friendly | magnificent views | screened porch | morganton
Sentence: The hot tub did not get hot enough so we could not use it the upstairs bedroom had leaks so when it was raining all night it was constant dripping noises hitting the floor there was dead bugs on the windowsills and the washer machine was broke
Verbatim: The cabin was cute but could of been cleaner. The hot tub did not get hot enough so we could not use it the upstairs bedroom had leaks so when it was raining all night it was constant dripping noises hitting the floor there was dead bugs on the windowsills and the washer machine was broke

HA_HOTELNAME: brand new 9bd/5ba at storey lake! south facing pool/spa/game room
Sentence: The pool was not clean or heated on our check in date.
Verbatim: The home was as pictured but the floors were not clean. The pool was not clean or heated on our check in date. The space was awesome and the location was perfect.

HA_HOTELNAME: dog-friendly mountain-view escape w/ free wifi, fireplace, private hot tub & w/d
Sentence: ALL I WANTED TO DO ON THIS VACATION WAS TO SOAK IN A HOT TUB, only to open it to discover a disgusting, brown, oily ring around the entire hot tub about 2 inches above the waterline.
Verbatim:
Let me preference this by saying that I only take a vacation about every 5 years and really needed this one. Unfortunately, it was largely ruined thanks to the accommodations.

My stay in Cabin #9 began with getting in after dark, and all I wanted was to make dinner and have a glass of wine. Well, the wine I picked up was warm and needed an ice cube, only to find that the refrigerator ice maker was not working and that I had to fill up 2 dirty, empty trays with water and wait for them to freeze. Not to mention the fact that the water dispenser didn't work either, and I had not purchased bottled water while at the store.

I then tried to cook a nice dinner on a relatively gross stove, only to discover that all the pans were old, super scratched Teflon pans that absolutely EVERYTHING stuck to, so I heated up canned soup, which I removed from the stove with sticky, filthy potholders.

Day 2 I tried to do some work, but the internet connection was so slow that it was impossible (download = 7.16 mbps / upload = 0.91 mbps).

Day 3 was warm enough for me to get into the hot tub, which is the reason I booked this listing. ALL I WANTED TO DO ON THIS VACATION WAS TO SOAK IN A HOT TUB, only to open it to discover a disgusting, brown, oily ring around the entire hot tub about 2 inches above the waterline. At this point, I am so frustrated that I call Vacasa support, and in their defense, a very nice gentleman almost immediately arrived to clean the hot tub. However, after wiping off the goo, he told me he shocked it and put a couple of floating sponges in it to absorb all of the oil. As you can imagine, after all of that, I was absolutely not getting into that hot tub.

In addition, there were . . . 
- ancient, hard, flat Walmart pillows
- cheap, sandpaper-like toilet paper and paper towels
- no trash bags
- broken blinds
- dirty carpet
- leather furniture with the leather worn away
- and more

I have never rented with Vrbo before. I have always used AirBNB. However, I don’t think this was Vrbo’s fault. I will simply always rent with an individual owner, not with a vacation rental management company like Vacasa.

HA_HOTELNAME: 23 poplar-sunriver, oregon: hot tub, bbq, wifi, sharc aquatics, tubing hill, mt. bachelor, golf, deschutes river, tennis, bike paths
Sentence: Hot tub had 3 working jets and was murky.
Verbatim:
We stayed over the long xmas weekend 2022. The picture and description should include the statement, not for bad knee or anyone old or young that is unstable. No mention of the steep driveway (which was not cleared) Thank God for 4 wheel drive. OR steep outside steps to front door and decks with thick ice and crusty hard snow. The Septic tank needs to be emptied, as the whole house smells when you do dishes, take a shower or run the washer. 
No way this was going to be fixed over the holiday weekend so we were stuck in a smelly house for 4+ days. 
If your a cook bring your tools and supplies - basic items provided. 
Hot tub had 3 working jets and was murky. 
The carpets were stained and needed cleaning asap.
The sound of guns being fired started at 7am and went all day, which was unsettling the dogs, as well as us. Loud bags and rapid fire,. They must have gotten guns for xmas? 
We made the best of it and reported to Mt. Properties management, who offered us a 5 percent discount on our next visit.

HA_HOTELNAME: waterfront home - watch a sunset from the hot tub, private beach, stunning view!
Sentence: The hot tub was dirty
Verbatim:
My family had a great time. It's a quiet spot with a beautiful view and access to the water.
The photos and description are misleading. There are not 2 sets of bunk beds. There is one. Thinking each kid would have a bed to sleep on was wrong. Someone had to sleep on the couch! Very frustrating.
Second, there was not a play toy in the yard. There was nothing.
The hot tub was dirty and there were dirty dishes in the dishwasher. Ewww
Despite all of that it's a beautiful property.

HA_HOTELNAME: p51 - 751 98th st in marathon
Sentence: The pool floats are dirty .
Verbatim:
House is nice. KING SIZE BED is too soft for what we used to.
Very responsive agent ( thanks Leslie)
Was a great experience ..TV program should have more acessible programs to enjoy when u stay in.
Lack of tea towels in the kitchen ..And hand towels .
The pool floats are dirty . Mold in the bin. 
Could have use a little cleaning . 
However , we had a great time so those are suggestions that could make more comfortable stay

HA_HOTELNAME: new sanctuary village villa 7219: 3br/3ba home with private pool & yard
Sentence: Dirty pool;
Verbatim: Property manager never replied to my inquiries. Flying in, and not knowing what to expect was troubling. Unit maintenance was lacking. Rotted decking. Broken patio furniture. Dirty pool; however, they did clean on our second day. Rented for 8 people, but only enough plates and cups for for four. Not a good choice for those flying in.

HA_HOTELNAME: lake views, pet friendly w/hot tub, bbq, fireplace, decks, 5 levels (hnc0693)
Sentence: I called manager to clear the ice dam that was blocking front door, which they refused to do even after I calling to tell them I fell and broke my ankle.
Verbatim:
Wonderful view, TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE. House is more than 120 yards from the parking lot….it was not shoveled the entire time we stayed here. I called manager to clear the ice dam that was blocking front door, which they refused to do even after I calling to tell them I fell and broke my ankle. 
My husband ended up shoveling the walkway, three times. There is a terrible neighbor who yelled at us in the parking lot two days in a row. On our last day, he threatened to hit my husband with a ski pole. 
On top of the ice damn and no snow removal, the front deck was covered in dog poop. I asked the manager if they could clean it up, which they refused to do. We paid more than $10k for the time we rented this property, so hopefully you can understand our frustration. We will definitely NOT be back.

HA_HOTELNAME: close to downtown & bishop arts! 2 king & office!
Sentence: • The leg on the couch was broken.
Verbatim:
The property for the most part was great! I've listed a few things below that were not up to par:
• The listing said there was a coffee maker but there was no coffee maker.
• The outlets in both bathrooms did not work.
• The door in one of the bathrooms was off the hinge.
• There were not enough blankets for the beds. I would recommend putting extra blankets in the closets for use if guests want extra blankets.
• The leg on the couch was broken.
• There was no WiFi and if there was, there were no clear instructions on how to connect.

HA_HOTELNAME: luxury 5 single family  with private pool 13 guests - private pool - 2751 bm
Sentence: The kitchen table has a sharp metal piece on the under side that I cut my leg on twice, we then put a bandaid over the metal.
Verbatim:
Overall our stay was fine. There were some things that need improvement. The location in proximity to stores and disney world parks is perfect. It is a little farther from the pool area than we usually prefer. This is a very large complex.
They did provide a pack n play and kids dishes which was great. However there is not 1 single pan to be used in the oven. This house has 5 bedrooms with atleast 1 themed for children, children who typically love fries and chicken nuggets, we need a baking pan.
Also, the kitchen table and coffee table are not kid friendly. They are glass with pointy corners.
The kitchen table has a sharp metal piece on the under side that I cut my leg on twice, we then put a bandaid over the metal.
There are lots of dirt and markings over the walls, not a game changer but aesthically displeasing.
There are a few light bulbs that need to be changed. The lights would turn on and then flicker off after 20 minutes. 
The pool table sticks had broken tips.
The most annoying thing about staying here is that there is terrible cell service so wifi is a necessity. Well the wifi did not work for the first 3 days. I was able to contact someone when we left the house but then did not receive the response until the next day due to no service. When the company came to fix it they told us it's known that cell service here is terrible. 
Since we stayed here for our disney vacation I had to get up early to go to Starbucks down the rode 3 mornings in a row to book genie +, this was highly frustrating.
Overall, the house for the price was a bit disappointing but once the wifi was fixed it served its purpose for sleeping there while enjoying the parks. There are a lot of little things that need to taken care of.

HA_HOTELNAME: river retreat on golf course and a block from river
Sentence: There were a couple chairs that the legs were a bit broken but no issue.
Verbatim:
The house was great overall. We enjoyed our stay. There was a learning curve to using the cooktop but that was part of the adventure. 
There were a couple chairs that the legs were a bit broken but no issue. We would definitely stay again. Great space and great house. The fireplace was nice

HA_HOTELNAME: city haven iii:  blocks to zoo, groceries, downtown bus with parking
Sentence: I banged my head a couple of times not thinking but it was not a big deal in the grand scheme of things.
Verbatim:
The location of the property was perfect for us as we were 5 mins away from where we need to be during the week. 

Our host from the onset was very communicative and quick to respond. The apartment had been cleaned early and she reached out to let us know we could check in early even though we didn't ask for it so that was a nice touch, pity we weren't in town yet. 

The apartment was accurate according to the listing and nothing was not a surprise to us which is always nice.

I would say that if you are a tall person (6' 3"), like myself, I would just be a little wary as the ceilings are lower than usual apartments. The issue really wasn't the ceiling in my case, it was the door frames. I banged my head a couple of times not thinking but it was not a big deal in the grand scheme of things.

The bathroom was clean and had plenty of body wash, shampoo and conditioner which was nice to have. 

I would recommend the host to add aluminum foil in the apartment because one day we made frozen pizzas in the oven and as the tray provided had gaps in it we had a little bit of a crumb cleanup because it was impossible to prevent crumbs falling through. 

Parking at the property was very convenient with a caveat. Parking is in the alley way where it's super tight. With a passenger van it's a tight squeeze and you have to be super careful not to not anything. 

Overall, it was a great stay hence the 5 star rating. Thank you for a lovely stay. Would certainly recommend to anyone.

HA_HOTELNAME: enjoy views from the brand new hot tub
Sentence: Also I am the future the blind swings open when you open the upstairs door it cut my leg.
Verbatim: The only problem we had was the television in the downstairs living room didn’t work and no smoke detectors on the downstairs. Also I’m the future the blind swings open when you open the upstairs door it cut my leg. But over all we loved it

HA_HOTELNAME: secluded smoky mountain log cabin rental between pigeon forge and gatlinburg
Sentence: The only concern I have is the stairs outside, they were very slippery and I took a fall from the top all the way down.
Verbatim: This was a perfect getaway! The cabin was clean and comfortable, they allowed our dogs! The only concern I have is the stairs outside, they were very slippery and I took a fall from the top all the way down. I would recommend to put some gripping tape on them. Other than that it was perfect!

HA_HOTELNAME: gorgeously updated hillside home with private hot tub, firepit & mountain view
REVIEW_TITLE: nice house but safety / construction issues
Sentence: there were exposed staples which cut my friends foot as she was doing down
Verbatim:
Moose tracks is a really nice rental, with newer finishes, ample room, and beautiful amenities. It’s well maintained and clean. 

However, since it looks like it’s a new construction, we had a couple of issues. One is that on the stairs going down to the basement, there were exposed staples which cut my friends foot as she was doing down. I sent pictures to the Vacasa host but no real response and it wasn’t taken care of. This is a safety hazard. The second, and less important, issue was that the hot tub wasn’t properly working. We were able to
Resolve this with help from the Vacasa team but took a long time and we couldn’t use the tub.

Overall, nice house but with some issues.

HA_HOTELNAME: from luxurycozumel collection - architectural lovers dream retreat!
REVIEW_TITLE: great stay marred by safety issue
Sentence: Unfortunately, one of the lasting memories of our stay were two of my family members injuring themselves on a missing step on the path into the water.
Verbatim: Overall - we enjoyed our stay at the Villa. It's a beautiful property. We also hired chefs through Sandra's kitchen which made for a comfortable eating experience. Most of the bedrooms had a mildew smell, which I suppose is understandable in a tropical environment. Unfortunately, one of the lasting memories of our stay were two of my family members injuring themselves on a missing step on the path into the water. One family member bloodied up his lower leg badly and another family member ended up falling and hitting her head and chest. It has been two weeks since our stay and unfortunately her chest pains are still there. I've notified the property manager of the issue so I hope it won't affect future guests.

HA_HOTELNAME: beautiful home with fireplace, hot tub, free wifi, pool table  & mountain views
REVIEW_TITLE: gorgeous house but cleanliness and amenities of property were lacking
Sentence: Downstairs shower needs an anti slip mat as my friend fell while showering and had to leave to seek medical attention on my 40th Birthday.
Verbatim: Mattresses were all hard as a rock. My back hurt after the first night. 1 TV in all of the house. No access to master closet so had to hang my clothes in one of the other rooms. The owner should at least provide a rolling rack. Extra pillows were stored under the bed on the floor. Found crumbs and pills in corner of floor in kitchen. Thank geez we didn't have infants or toddlers with us. I swept so much debris from under fridge and stove. Kitchen appliances are the cheapest of the cheap. Master bathroom lights and outlets went out 2 days into trip and I contacted Vacasa but they never responded. Downstairs shower needs an anti slip mat as my friend fell while showering and had to leave to seek medical attention on my 40th Birthday. Checkout time is 10am but cleaners were sitting outside the house before then causing me and my daughter to stress about having to pack up by ourselves since our friends had to leave. My friend found a booger on her comforter in the downstairs bedroom so not sure how often it is cleaned between guests. Spa needed to be filled with water but there were no instructions on how to do that. With heavy snow the entire trip the driveway wasn't plowed once and the street the house was on wasn't plowed on Sunday making it difficult to get to since the house is uphill. The house is gorgeous but we just had too many issues with our stay for the amount of money it cost. We were there to spend my 40th Birthday together and it ended on a bad note.

HA_HOTELNAME: japanese style home on 1 acre with pool, 1 acre garden planted around lava flow
Sentence: I fell in and was hurt and it ruined my entire trip.
Verbatim:
A very dangerous sunk tub in master bathroom. I fell in and was hurt and it ruined my entire trip. Railing or complete removal of this tub should be done. I have brusied left leg, sprain right ankle and bruised right ribs. we arrived at the home all the lock box codes were wrong the housekeeper forgot to put in new codes for us. we get a call from the owner that the day we were to leave was 1/23 and that we were still in the house on on 1/24 according to the housekeeper. We left the house at 9:00 am on 1/23 to our other rental in Kona. 10 days later the owner called and said that we stained the carpet. The carpet had stains from all over the carpet on our arrival on 1/17. I have been to the big island +10 times and this is the worst home we have rented it destroyed my vacation. That bathroom sunken tile tub is dangerous even if its lighted or dark. This could be very good rental if the owners would correct some safety issues, a fall into this tub could kill someone if they hit their head. I was hurt but I also was very lucky it could of been alot worst
Tim

HA_HOTELNAME: japanese style home on 1 acre with pool, 1 acre garden planted around lava flow
Sentence: I have brusied left leg, sprain right ankle and bruised right ribs.
Verbatim:
A very dangerous sunk tub in master bathroom. I fell in and was hurt and it ruined my entire trip. Railing or complete removal of this tub should be done. I have brusied left leg, sprain right ankle and bruised right ribs. we arrived at the home all the lock box codes were wrong the housekeeper forgot to put in new codes for us. we get a call from the owner that the day we were to leave was 1/23 and that we were still in the house on on 1/24 according to the housekeeper. We left the house at 9:00 am on 1/23 to our other rental in Kona. 10 days later the owner called and said that we stained the carpet. The carpet had stains from all over the carpet on our arrival on 1/17. I have been to the big island +10 times and this is the worst home we have rented it destroyed my vacation. That bathroom sunken tile tub is dangerous even if its lighted or dark. This could be very good rental if the owners would correct some safety issues, a fall into this tub could kill someone if they hit their head. I was hurt but I also was very lucky it could of been alot worst
Tim

HA_HOTELNAME: location is everything plus wifi
Sentence: If you love to sit and people watch ,do not mind a bit of traffic this house is ideal,There is stairs to kitchen area so not recommend for people with injuries.
Verbatim: Great Location minute walk to shops ,beach and parks.If you love to sit and people watch ,don't mind a bit of traffic this house is ideal,There is stairs to kitchen area so not recommend for people with injuries.Ideal for two seperate families as seperate sleeping areas.Like any two storey house downstairs bedroom can hear all movement upstairs.Furniture and beds are comfortable and modern and bonus to have two big screen tv's in the house,for those relax moments.The only thing i could say is the hill hoist could be replaced as we were very close to hitting our heads on the corners and was in the way.All is needed is another small stand alone clothes airer.

HA_HOTELNAME: corner lake getaway
Sentence: We had to buy toilet paper because what was supplied was so rough that my skin was bleeding by day two!
Verbatim: The weather was horrible. There was a 4-5" snow a few days after we got there. The condo had no ice melt, kitty litter, or sand to put out. There was no shovel and not even a broom. The temperature was in the 20s most of our stay. A few days later, an ice storm hit with about 4" of ice pellets falling in sheets for about 30 hours. We were completely stranded inside the condo and had nothing but breakfast cereals to eat as we had planned on eating at our daughter's house on another lake or eating out. The garbage truck did not run the whole last week and the bin was so full the lid wouldn't shut when we left. We got so desperate that I used a cookie sheet to clear the steps so we could get out to the sidewalk. The bath linens were worn out, some badly stained, and all faded. The bath rugs had no backing so they slipped out from under our feet daily. Two of us are disabled. One hit the floor while trying to stand from the toilet when the rug her feet was on slid away. I nearly fell twice just trying to step out of the shower, but the floor was even slicker. Rugs are definitely needed with rubber backing. Some previous person had broken the door jamb off the front door that held the chain lock. Someone had tried to repair it with hot glue and a few short nails. I could stick all 4 fingers under the board because it was not repaired correctly. As a result, the chain lock was worthless. The neighbor in unit 67 made so much noise between midnight and 1:00 a.m. that my husband or I was up every night concerned our vehicle or something else was being damaged. We checked the parking lot repeatedly because the noise sounded like it was coming against our walls and/or outside. This unit needs a lot of routine repairs. At least one electrical outlet by the couch did not work. The kitchen sink light is in an open hole in the ceiling. Several places had some type outlet loosely hanging from the walls. The door frames into the kitchen were dirty. We had to buy toilet paper because what was supplied was so rough that my skin was bleeding by day two! The outside especially needs painting as the exposed wood is deteriorating in many places. Frankly, the whole unit needs a lot of basic upkeep. The parking lot is extremely uneven which was very dangerous when covered in ice. Fortunately, the heating was excellent and the beds were okay. We had plenty of hot water. Owner had a lot of spices and, thankfully, a full box of table salt we used on the steps.

HA_HOTELNAME: family friendly condo with wifi, pool, & hot tub - dogs ok
Sentence: my husband cut his foot
Verbatim:
Condo was nice but the kitchen floor tiles were cracked and my husband cut his foot. Needs to be replaced soon. 
The hot tub does not work. The women’s bathrooms in pool area were locked. 
The washing machine does not work and I lost my money. Called service and was told the person that takes care of was in a meeting and would check it out after. But I went back to the laundry and the error codes were still on the machine!

HA_HOTELNAME: the kaka bach in central taupo
Sentence: The property was of a great location and simple walk to lake and town, however there are a few items we feel need addressing for future guests: The pedestal basin in the ensuite is very loose and the first night my wife leaned down on it when it moved she fell over.
Verbatim:
The property was of a great location and simple walk to lake and town, however there are a few items we feel need addressing for future guests:
The pedestal basin in the ensuite is very loose and the first night my wife leaned down on it when it moved she fell over. Having no silicon seal is also a little unhygienic.
The tap in kitchen sink is very loose and you had to hold at the base when using it, again silicon seal not effective allowing water to splash under.
We only used the BBQ once as the tray in bottom with absorbent caught fire, i had gone into the kitchen and luckily my daughter saw the flames and i managed to extinguish. Definitely needs changing out.

All these are minor issues that could be easily fixed. Thanks for the use.

HA_HOTELNAME: modern & comfy 2 br ~ mins to beach & casino #191
Sentence: If you do see I have a prosthetic leg so I fell going to the room and bust my leg against the foor towards the TV but I caught myself
Verbatim: If you do see I have a prosthetic leg so I fell going to the room and bust my leg against the foor towards the TV but I caught myself

HA_HOTELNAME: 185mb/s wifi with an amazing pool 3 bed 2.5bath house
REVIEW_TITLE: francisco, the home owner was fantastic. he was extremely helpful. when i fell and broke my wrist he
Sentence: When I fell and broke my wrist he took me to the clinic, stayed to do the translation for us and only left after we were seen to.
Verbatim:
He was extremely helpful. When I fell and broke my wrist he took me to the clinic, stayed to do the translation for us and only left after we were seen to. After we got home, he came over and drove us to a mall so that I could get the brace that I need for my wrist. Then he drove us around the area by the house and pointed out the shops, stores etc. He was always available to answer any question we had, When we had a small problem with the hot water, he came over right away to see what was needed, it turned out to be that we needed gas.
The house was as advertised, very nice and clean with lots of the things, dishes, utensils etc. we needed. He had even put a lovely chocolate cake in the fridge for our arrival. I highly recommend this house to anyone interested. It is in an ideal location and close to a lot of stores. When I return to Merida I'll certainly rent this property again..

HA_HOTELNAME: charming, 50's era beach cottage | pet friendly, fenced yard & screened porch
Sentence: I was recovering from a broken leg
Verbatim: We thoroughly enjoyed our two week stay. We went into Savannah, Fort Pulaski, Hilton Head. We rented a golf cart and tooled around the island, great fun. It is only 4 block walk to the beach but I was recovering from a broken leg. We ate several places but we ate twice at AJ’s, North Bar and Hucapoos. The house was great, we loved it, our puppies loved the fenced in yard. We would highly recommend this house.

HA_HOTELNAME: toprated! sleeps10 4kingbeds immaculat decor (367)
Sentence: I fell on the step up to the door which is detached from the house and tripped numerous times on the walkway to the house which has several large cracks .
Verbatim: This was a good spot for a family of five. Neighbors were friendly. They sent someone to repair a fallen towel bar that a prior guest had toppled. Plenty of dishes. It is an older property though. The front is a bit difficult if you have ambulatory issues. I fell on the step up to the door which is detached from the house and tripped numerous times on the walkway to the house which has several large cracks . My husband stubbed his toe on the same area. Windows don’t close all the way and basement had a definite odor so I could not use it. It does have a ton of space if you can overlook these issues.

HA_HOTELNAME: daniel's little bear hot tub hideaway
REVIEW_TITLE: got there on tuesday for a 14 nights stay 1-24-23 and left on 1-30-23
Sentence: Left early when Teri fell in the snow & broke her ankle.
Verbatim: Left early when Teri fell in the snow & broke her ankle. We left to get her home in Baton Rouge, La.

HA_HOTELNAME: welcome to arrow ridge lodge
Sentence: However, every single one of my guests fell down the steps.
Verbatim: It was all great. However, every single one of my guests fell down the steps. They were way too shallow and slippery. Other than that, we had a blast.

HA_HOTELNAME: * home, sweet home *
REVIEW_TITLE: 2 month stay after birth of grandson
Sentence: which worked fantastic for my blind dog and my husband, who dislocated his ankle and broke his fibula shortly after arriving in Missoula
Verbatim:
This property was clean and well-stocked. Since we were staying for two months, I assumed I would need to replenish the paper products myself. I was wrong - there was plenty of TP and paper towels for our entire stay! The kitchen was also well stocked. There were even a few of my favorite Pampered Chef tools available, much to my delight!

It was mainly my husband and I who stayed here but the other rooms were used off-and-on by our adult children and grandkids. All the beds were very comfortable, and we were happy to use the portable playpen for the new baby and the toys and books for the 3-year-old.

There was no carpet and no stairs - which worked fantastic for my blind dog and my husband, who dislocated his ankle and broke his fibula shortly after arriving in Missoula. So if you are looking for an easy-to-maneuver house, this one will work great! :-)

The only suggestions for improvement is that the couch, although a perfect fit for the living room, definitely should be updated (owner said this is planned for spring), and the neighbors, while friendly, did not shovel the driveway as planned every time it snowed. In Missoula, snow tends to melt on the driveway within a couple of days anyway, but with my husband in a boot and on a scooter, he was not able to shovel the driveway himself so sometimes it was snow-packed for a few days.

Communication with the owner was pleasant and quick. She even left Griz onesies as a present for our new grandson - very thoughtful! We will stay here again!

HA_HOTELNAME: charming villa, across the street from the beach with view of the sierra madres
Sentence: We arrived at the property to learn that the washing machine was broken, (it was fixed a few days later), that the house was only about 15 feet from a very busy highway with speed bumps close by resulting in screeching trucks and vehicles all day and night.
Verbatim: We arrived at the property to learn that the washing machine was broken, (it was fixed a few days later), that the house was only about 15 feet from a very busy highway with speed bumps close by resulting in screeching trucks and vehicles all day and night. The pool is described as chilly…it was freezing and mostly in the shade as was the lovely courtyard. We swam in it only twice. The open areas in the main floor bedroom bathroom and on staircase allowed animals into the main living area. The host resolved this by having the maintenance man affix a lock on the door leading to the upstairs bedrooms but nothing was done about the bathroom. Animals still got in. The host also purchased some fresh towels and coffee mugs during our stay. Kitchen is fairly well stocked but many pot lids were broken and utensils needed replacing. We felt that the house was overpriced at 4500 Canadian dollars for 3 weeks. We will not be staying here again.

HA_HOTELNAME: dog-friendly mountain home w/private hot tub - 6 mins to lifts & downtown
Sentence: No one from our group had been bleeding and when we sprayed it with cleaner the blood turned orange like the comforter had not been washed at all.
Verbatim:
I hate leaving negative reviews but hopefully an honest review will help others considering this property. 

For starters, when we flipped one of the comforters around we found blood all over the backside. No one from our group had been bleeding and when we sprayed it with cleaner the blood turned orange like the comforter hadn't been washed at all. 

It doesn't seem like whoever runs this property has actually stayed here. The mattresses are all so uncomfortable my parents rented a separate place to stay in so they could get some sleep. There weren't enough towels for eight people. There wasn't enough room for our family (8 people) to sit together in the living room. Multiple outlets don't work. Neither of the coffee makers work.

My sister called the property management company and they brought more towels and a new coffee maker. However, they never responded to my message when I sent them a photo of the bloody comforter and listed other concerns. 

My family drove nine hours to stay here and we all couldn't wait to leave. Not how you want to spend a family vacation. 

To end on a positive note: The cabin had a lot of space, the location is great and the hot tub was nice. They also sent a crew to clear the deck and stairs of snow.

HA_HOTELNAME: fort lauderdale oasis with private pool and boat dock
Sentence: I fell and hurt my knee.
Verbatim:
Ft Lauderdale had unseasonably cold weather the weekend we were there. 
The heater did not go on. Host informed us by email that a mechanic could not come and we had no choice but to leave 
that same evening. The house was freezing. We wore our winter coats the entire time I was trying to contact VRBO and the host 
The laundry room has an unmarked step down at the edge of the washer dryer. I fell and hurt my knee. I did not use the machines after that. The sliding doors are very old and difficult to open. The outdoor area had debris. All in all unpleasant experience. I am requesting a refund.

HA_HOTELNAME: private 3 bd/2.5 ba close to downtown & medical district
REVIEW_TITLE: stay cut short poor accomodations-hazard conditions
Sentence: One of our friends slipped and fell and hit his head.
Verbatim: The property is not set up for six people. The living room has one small sofa- and the only TV in the house is in the living room. The kitchen has chairs that are way too low for the height of the bar. We had to buy coffee cups- there were only 4- There weren't enough towels for 6 people- nor enough pots/pans to cook (what's there is seen better days). The check in instructions in the VRBO sent 3 days prior were wrong. The revised one was sent while we were flying so of course we didn't see them. The condo # on our reservation (1212) was wrong. We were in 1210- All of these issues I found out by trying to enter the wrong door. The guest in 1212 was very irate and slammed the door in our faces. The floors in 1210 were a danger hazard- the transitions between the tile and the laminate were poorly installed and uneven. Between the kitchen tile and the laminate, large portions of the transitions have come unglued. One of our friends slipped and fell and hit his head. There are other areas in the upstairs and downstairs bedroom where the laminate floor is also uneven. After that incident which we contacted the owner we decided to cut our stay short and leave two days early. She acted suspicious so I sent her a photo of the area were our guest tripped. She disingenuously told us to go see a doctor and she would reimburse us, yet refused to credit us for the two days. Overall, it was the worst experience ever!

HA_HOTELNAME: charming downtown home, close to everything!
Sentence: I fell on a broken kitchen chair and bumped my head as well as other family members.
Verbatim: Walked in the place and was surprised that this home had only 4 bedroom, the extra bedroom was the 4th room not the 5th. The Living-room isn’t large enough for 5 people. There were broken items in the home and when I attempted to call to communicate Justin did not answers Justin only answered when I first arrived and when I left. Steps were not salted and had ice where I slipped multiple times. I fell on a broken kitchen chair and bumped my head as well as other family members. Don’t stay here as the practices are unfair.

HA_HOTELNAME: casita del sol ~ peaceful 2 story cottage retreat
Sentence: My wife needs hip replacement and she was using the outside (regular) steps, since the inside stairs were impossible, but it was dark and the outside stairs were covered in dew and mold, she slipped and fell.
Verbatim: To use the bathroom or kitchen you must climb a spiral staircase. Yes, it was disclosed, but I missed it. It was VERY inconvenient to live with. Especially at night. My wife needs hip replacement and she was using the outside (regular) steps, since the inside stairs were impossible, but it was dark and the outside stairs were covered in dew and mold, she slipped and fell. We left early. You have been warned.

HA_HOTELNAME: million dollar panoramic views! huge decks and  pool!
REVIEW_TITLE: for the price we expected perfection.
Sentence: Uncovered metal leftovers of buttons cut into your legs when you sat on the couch.
Verbatim:
I will start out by saying that the property was clean. I appreciate that.
The security was dismal. Our separate poolside flop house( for which we spent 1/3 of the price)did not lock and the door screen blew in the wind. If we left the glass door open to the breeze a cat came in through the screen! One panel in the outside shower ( our only shower in the cabana bedroom)was broken so you were naked to the island. We had to figure out how to make the water warm. 
There were six of us but 5 beach chairs. The snorkeling equipment was too old and not effective. No hand towels or washcloths and only one dish towel. We could not wash towels and reuse as the dryer was broken the whole time! We had to haul gallons of water because the manager told us not to drink the filtered? water. There are no deadbolts as advertised. 
The manager and his girlfriend stayed under the main house which made us worried about being noisy at all. 
The furniture in the main house was quite shabby. Uncovered metal leftovers of buttons cut into your legs when you sat on the couch. Honestly? It would have been an adventuresome fun rental if we paid half the price. We felt taken.

HA_HOTELNAME: newly remodeled apt located in historical downtown kellogg.
Sentence: Parking in the lot was ok, however, with the snow and ice it was easy to slip and fall.
Verbatim: We really enjoyed staying in the apartment and would stay there again. The only downside was the parking. Parking in the lot was ok, however, with the snow and ice it was easy to slip and fall. Luckily were all careful and no one was hurt.

HA_HOTELNAME: hot toddy cottage - pet friendly, hot tub at 3bd home half mile from heart of banner elk
Sentence: La barra del baño se cayó al colocar la toalla, por todo lo demás nos gusto.
Verbatim: La barra del baño se cayó al colocar la toalla, por todo lo demás nos gusto. Gracias.

HA_HOTELNAME: dog-friendly mountain home w/private hot tub - 6 mins to lifts & downtown
Sentence: No one from our group had been bleeding and when we sprayed it with cleaner the blood turned orange like the comforter had not been washed at all.
Verbatim:
I hate leaving negative reviews but hopefully an honest review will help others considering this property. 

For starters, when we flipped one of the comforters around we found blood all over the backside. No one from our group had been bleeding and when we sprayed it with cleaner the blood turned orange like the comforter hadn't been washed at all. 

It doesn't seem like whoever runs this property has actually stayed here. The mattresses are all so uncomfortable my parents rented a separate place to stay in so they could get some sleep. There weren't enough towels for eight people. There wasn't enough room for our family (8 people) to sit together in the living room. Multiple outlets don't work. Neither of the coffee makers work.

My sister called the property management company and they brought more towels and a new coffee maker. However, they never responded to my message when I sent them a photo of the bloody comforter and listed other concerns. 

My family drove nine hours to stay here. It was $2k for three nights, in addition to the separate place my parents rented, and we all couldn't wait to leave. Not how you want to spend a family vacation. 

To end on a positive note: The cabin had a lot of space, the location is great and the hot tub was nice. They also sent a crew to clear the deck and stairs of snow.

HA_HOTELNAME: new 2019 miami condo @hyde breathtaking waterviews!
Sentence: I had to go to the urgent care because I hurt my lower back and right wrist.
Verbatim: The condo was great but once you arrive there is an additional fee $110 a day which should have been stated before hand because what if I didn’t have a card. The views was lovely. I called and called about one of the balcony chairs had just fell apart while I was sitting in it. I had to go to the urgent care because I hurt my lower back and right wrist. I called and called NO ANSWER so I sent an email and still NOTHING

HA_HOTELNAME: mopokes, 41 bradley drive
Sentence: Please advise Penelope that we unfortunately broke a large and small glass and our son put his foot through one of the banana lounges on the front deck as he was getting up from it.
Verbatim:
A lovely property in a private but convenient location. We loved the modern design.The property was very well equipped e.g. appliances and cooking utensils unlike other holiday places we have stayed at.
We found the property very clean and comfortable to stay in.
Please advise Penelope that we unfortunately broke a large and small glass and our son put his foot through one of the banana lounges on the front deck as he was getting up from it.
Otherwise it was an enjoyable and incident free stay.
Please convey our thanks to Penelope for an enjoyable stay.
Tony and Gretel

HA_HOTELNAME: chickadee chalet a short distance from downtown and the ski hill.
Sentence: Our only concern is that there was no handrail on the stairs, and my husband hurt his knee because of it.
Verbatim: This spot was perfect for our family of five. Check in was a little old school with a lock box attached to a door- but it was easy to get in. The home was well stocked with anything you could possibly need. We loved the goodies provided, especially the local soap and tea! We spent the afternoon watching the wildlife in the backyard- turkeys in the trees, and deer meandering by. The house was super comfortable, and the natural light was amazing. The toys provided kept our children more than entertained. The library of books was amazing! Our only concern is that there was no handrail on the stairs, and my husband hurt his knee because of it. The hosts sent great communication via text, but we didn’t hear back from them when we requested a late check out (which is totally fine). All in all, the Chickadee chalet was perfect for our family and we would love to stay here again.

HA_HOTELNAME: charming appt nine 4p. les ménuires at the foot of the slopes
Sentence: Un petit logement mais idéalement placé au pied des pistes, à 5min en œufs de la Croisette, permettant de couper avec les écrans et d' admirer la montagne sans vis-à-vis.
Verbatim: Un petit logement mais idéalement placé au pied des pistes, à 5min en œufs de la Croisette, permettant de couper avec les écrans et d’admirer la montagne sans vis-à-vis. 3 bons restaurants sont accessibles à pied autour du logement. C’est super pour des vacances en couple !

HA_HOTELNAME: idle daze beach house
Sentence: Graham Colyer drive has two public cut throughs which made the property super accessible to the beach and the shops on foot, skateboards or bikes
Verbatim: We had the best 3 nights here with 2 surfing families. The location is epic, Graham Colyer drive has two public cut throughs which made the property super accessible to the beach and the shops on foot, skateboards or bikes. It’s far enough out of the hub that it provides a relaxed and peaceful retreat to return to after a day at the main beach. We utilised the track through Sandcastle’s Resort to access the beach for early morning surfs. The house itself has a relaxed beach vibe and quirky charm. Unfortunately linen was not supplied which was the only down side. We took two dogs and unfortunately there are gaps under the front fences and our small dog got out one morning but was returned by a friendly local. We loved the front deck and spent most of our time at the house relaxing on it. Would absolutely book this house again.

HA_HOTELNAME: loggers run 17 - snowshoe - ski in ski out private hot tub overlooking slope, garage
Sentence: my son fell down the stairs
Verbatim: We arrived to dirty dishes in the sink, dirty dishes in the dishwasher, a sink drain full of rotten food, and the garbage disposal smelled horrible. The beds had dirty sheets on them; we had TO WASH THE LINENS before we could sleep! Dirty bathrooms with hair and dirt in the sinks and shower. The shower was full of mold and did not drain. Floors were unclean; if you walked around without socks, your feet were black. The counters and floors are full of dried and nasty food and dog hair. Dirty dishes in the cabinets and old food that was dried. The property is unsafe; the baseboards are so bowed from the walls you trip. The stair railing is broken, and my son fell down the stairs. The smoke detector has not been checked since August 2012, and the attic door does not close bad cold drafts. The linens are dirty, towels provided are the tiny and towels from Walmart that still had "inspection" stickers on them and would not even fit around my 12-year-old. The bathroom floors have mold and a thick layer of nasty hair and dirt around the sides. If you try to contact the property management company, the voicemail is full. When they finally emailed us on day 3, they did not provide a refund for the trip. The house is in a good location, but the house is so nasty and in disrepair, I WOULD NOT STAY HERE!

HA_HOTELNAME: mountain lodge 233 2 br condo with access to ball hooter lift
Sentence: someone is going to sit down and injure themselves on those things!
Verbatim: Cannot beat the location for ski in/ski out convenience and proximity to the village. But my positive points pretty much end there. All of the furniture and appliances in the unit are the absolute cheapest you can find in their categories. Beds were hard as rocks with lumpy, uneven pillows to match. Couch was also lumpy and uncomfortable. Several of the dining room chairs were legitimately about to fall apart, wobbling, or crooked; someone is going to sit down and injure themselves on those things! The microwave makes a terrible sound that is not confidence inspiring. The heat in the unit is odd, the bedrooms got very hot at night despite leaving the heaters off 100% of the time we were there. My only guess is heat from adjacent units makes them warm and no there is real way to cool them off short of opening a window in the freezing cold winter. I could go on, but those are the highlights. In short this unit cost WAAAAY too much money for there to be any excuse for the state that it was in. I paid over $600/night (after all the fees and taxes are added in) to get terrible sleep for 4 nights.

HA_HOTELNAME: upscale 8 bedroom, 6 bathroom villa in the heart of orlando's best theme parks
Sentence: This required me to go out and buy Styrofoam cups and plastic cups so that everyone could have something to drink at the same time, the ice machine was broken in the refrigerator so I had to buy ice and I had asked that every bathroom have at least one hand towel and that did not happen.
Verbatim: Overall, the house, location and property were OK. However, the kitchen was lacking in common kitchen utensils – can opener, limited glasses, and limited, coffee, mugs, limited, serving bowls, no can opener, and no potato peeler although the house says it can seat 16 they was only seating for 12. It was only silverware for eight. There was only glasses and coffee mugs for eight. This required me to go out and buy Styrofoam cups and plastic cups so that everyone could have something to drink at the same time, the ice machine was broken in the refrigerator so I had to buy ice and I had asked that every bathroom have at least one hand towel and that did not happen. Other houses that I have stayed in using Vrbo were much better equipped than this one.

HA_HOTELNAME: tru nawlin's flavor--live like a local-2 miles from the quarters in the  bywater
Sentence: Hope my host is ok, because it seemed like he fell off the face of the earth or maybe even passed away 😳
Verbatim: I booked my stay a few months ago & the reviews were great. However, as my stay got closer I thought it was strange I hadn't heard from my host. I attempted to reach him through messaging on VRBO, texts & phone calls, but received no response. Then I saw the last 2 guests who booked the property were not able to access it. I contacted VRBO & they couldn't reach my host, either. It was 48 hours out and I still hadn't received access instructions. At that point, I booked a hotel. At 24 hours out, still nothing from my host. I called him & phone was disconnected. On my day of arrival I got a message saying my reservation had been canceled & I had been refunded. Glad I booked that hotel! Hope my host is ok, because it seemed like he fell off the face of the earth or maybe even passed away 😳

HA_HOTELNAME: totally remodeled 3 level townhouse with endless long range view
REVIEW_TITLE: inviting place with a great view
Sentence: As a mobile young adult, I personally slipped and fell down the stairs our first morning at the property and although I did not sustain any major injuries, it should be something future tenants are aware of when booking this property.
Verbatim: This cozy townhome was perfect for our weekend at Beech Mountain. It was a close (less than 5 min) drive to the mountain, easy to access, and had everything we needed to cook all of our meals. The view is absolutely incredible and it was nice to just curl up by the fireplace and take in the view. I have reduced my rating by 1 star because the interior stairs of this home are quite steep. The height of the risers were higher than your average staircase and although there is a handrail, it is also higher than normal taking more effort to reach for. As a mobile young adult, I personally slipped and fell down the stairs our first morning at the property and although I did not sustain any major injuries, it should be something future tenants are aware of when booking this property.

HA_HOTELNAME: sweet home by homeslice stays
Sentence: Someone will slip and get hurt.
Verbatim: Very nice and would rent again. It does need three things. 1-dust pan 2- bigger/ automatic coffee pot 3- grab bar in shower. Shower steps down and very slippery when using. Someone will slip and get hurt. Loved our stay!

HA_HOTELNAME: stylish updated getaway: 2 mi to swim & shop!
Sentence: The bathroom hand sink stopper was broken so could not use that.
Verbatim: I don’t know if it was a wet dog stayed before us but between that stench and cigarette smoke smell I would not stay here. The bathroom hand sink stopper was broken so couldn’t use that. Also only 2 half rolls of toilet paper were left so ran out of that. Have never had to go buy my own toilet paper for a weekend stay.

HA_HOTELNAME: host & stay | caedmon house
Sentence: I also sent through the pictures of my injuries after the fall and I just received a ‘sorry about that and the ‘bollard was put there by the neighbour so not really our problem’ type of response - despite the bollard being on the pathway leading to the door of the property.
Verbatim:
We booked a two night stay at this property at the beginning of January 2023. The house was lovely, nicely decorated, very clean and spacious. The location was great, we were practically in the grounds of the abbey and the views of Whitby were amazing. We had zero complaints about the inside of the property. 

I did have a fall on the pathway leading to the door of the property as a large stone bollard was placed across the pathway and as there was no outside lighting and the bollard was not highlighted in anyway the fell over it in the dark and suffered some nasty cuts and grazes, it was a shame is it happened within two hours of checking in so put a slight dampener on the break! So just be careful of that bollard if you stay. 

We were really keen to re-book this place and we even had a few friends that were interested after we showed them the pictures however we won’t book this place again due to the after contact with Home Stay who are the company that look after the property. 

I left a couple of things behind at the house and it took 4 emails and 2 phone calls over a period of two weeks to finally be told they didn’t have my items. Two items were left in the washing machine by mistake and they have claimed that nothing was handed in. I know full well that they were left so to tell me that house-keeping didn’t find anything was a blatant lie as well as being fobbed off for two weeks. The items weren’t super expensive but did cost me £50.00 to replace, as one item was a equa-fleece dog all in one suit and a pair of bamboo socks. It was just so disappointing that they clearly have some very dishonest staff who would happily help themselves to guests property, whether that was keeping it themselves or disposing of it because they couldn’t be bothered to save it for me. 

I also sent through the pictures of my injuries after the fall and I just received a ‘sorry about that and the ‘bollard was put there by the neighbour so not really our problem’ type of response - despite the bollard being on the pathway leading to the door of the property. 

Anyway, all I would say is, the house is lovely you will not be disappointed but just be very aware of the stone bollard and do not accidentally leave any items behind as you will not see them again.

HA_HOTELNAME: loggers run 17 - snowshoe - ski in ski out private hot tub overlooking slope, garage
Sentence: Head out on your skis and either continue on the green, stop for a drink at the Flume Shack or cut right and go down J Hook (our favorite blue).
Verbatim: The condo was great, very clean and well stocked, The location is amazing. Just a little ways down from the Soaring Eagle lift. The condo has an awesome ski room where all equipment can be stored and easily put on and taken off. Walk out the back door and you are on Upper Flume, a green run. You can either make your way down the bank or walk ~ 10 feet over to a staircase that is pretty easy to navigate. Head out on your skis and either continue on the green, stop for a drink at the Flume Shack or cut right and go down J Hook (our favorite blue). After skiing, it’s easy to ski right to the unit and get in the back door. At night, catch the bus right out the front door to Appalachia Kitchen (amazing food), Tuque’s (pizza!) or go a little further to the Village for mexican at Sunset Cantina (ask for Cassie!). Then come back and play your favorite game on the large and beautiful dining room table or jump in the hot tub (comfortable for 4 adults).

HA_HOTELNAME: perfect for multiple families! 2 master suites, on free shuttle route
REVIEW_TITLE: gas leaks through out the property that were not fixed
Sentence: One of the children staying in the house passed out and fell down the stairs due to the smell of the gas that is added to natural gas for detection.
Verbatim: We stayed in this rental January 20-23. We left a night early due to four natural gas leaks through out the property. We had to call Xcel which said the fireplace needed to be shut off immediately and fixed. One of the children staying in the house passed out and fell down the stairs due to the smell of the gas that is added to natural gas for detection. The management company said it was safe to stay in the property. They turned off the fireplace but did not address anything else. We had to call them. Not one of them called to see how we were or if they could help. And when we asked to leave a night early because we did not feel safe, they gave us a hard time because they insisted it was safe. They did not fix the leaks on the main floor which is where the bunk room is where all the kids were sleeping. We did not feel comfortable or safe staying. I called several days later to follow up and the leaks had not been fixed. The management company laughed when I expressed my frustration at the lack of concern. Would not recommend a management company that is in the business of booking a house that is unsafe. One of the maintenance guys that came while Xcel was inspecting said the property had received the same complaint and nothing was done.

HA_HOTELNAME: beautiful, updated mountain home w/hot tub, balcony & fireplaces - dogs ok!
Sentence: Hot tub barely accessible (i had to call company to send someone to try and sculpt out a safer access after 3 of us had slipped and fallen).
Verbatim: This is a large home that accommodated my family of eight plus 4 dogs. We all slept well and were comfortable. I expected a lot more for the money we spent though. Bathrooms and kitchen were clean but other areas needed more attention (hair and debris on the night tables etc). There is a large broken armchair that resides in the living room for some reason that is a hazard. Lots of broken blinds. Back door to apartment unit would not open. Hot tub barely accessible (i had to call company to send someone to try and sculpt out a safer access after 3 of us had slipped and fallen). I had to clean up after previous renters dog. Etc... no pride of ownership with this property. Run by a company. Reached out a few days before check in to see if they had a pack and play and high chair, but didnt hear back until day after check in. Was advised that this property did not have those items but in actual fact they do! They were in the large closet located off the living room. This all being said, we enjoyed the area and being able to be all together.

HA_HOTELNAME: family getaway near disney. 1412
Sentence: The sofas downstairs had several stains the arm rest on the sofa was broken
Verbatim: Let me start with the communication with the property manger was awesome! He responded to all calls and emails. I am a travel agent and was disappointed with the property. The house is very spacious and could accommodate all ages. However I took pictures of the areas that were not appealing. The walls had stains on them throughout. There was a smell throughout the house that I had to go and purchase febreeze to try and remove. The sofas downstairs had several stains the arm rest on the sofa was broken and the smell on the sofas upstairs and downstairs was horrible. We went to the store and purchased bed sheets to lay on the sofas so that we could sit on them. The home needs new furniture, febreezed and walls repainted upstairs and downstairs.

HA_HOTELNAME: 3 br * 2 miles to disney, pool, spa, water park, game room, free wi-fi and more
Sentence: The springs in the large couch were broken/missing, so when you sat on it the frame of the couch dug into your legs.
Verbatim:
All in all, this rental felt like someone hastily slapped together a cheap hotel room without actually testing anything out to make sure it was actually comfortable. If you're looking to rent somewhere that is comfortable enough to feel like someone’s vacation home, I strongly suggest looking elsewhere.

The location of this rental was decent; it was very close to the Disney parks, Walmart, and within walking distance to the pool in the complex. The rental was also very clean, and reasonably accurate to the pictures in the listing. That being said, the rental itself needs some major TLC. The floors and showers squeak loudly, and the tiles outside of the children's room upstairs are cracked and broken. The springs in the large couch were broken/missing, so when you sat on it the frame of the couch dug into your legs. The beds are all extremely uncomfortable/lumpy, and the linens did not fit the beds very well, so they would come off the mattresses while we slept. The beds were so bad that my mother and stepfather ended up taking turns sleeping on an air mattress because they could not both sleep in the bed on the first level at the same time. The AC was locked at 73, and the temperature in the rental varied wildly between being extremely hot and very cold. All of the curtains were sheer so it was very difficult to sleep in as light would start coming in as soon as the sun started to rise. 

Additionally, the neighborhood the rental is in is a pain in the butt to get into; the guard gate will require that you stop and hand over the license of the driver before they will let you in (even if you are using an uber). This often resulted in a long wait if multiple people who are renting try to come in. There was also very little consistency in the check in process at the gate; sometimes we were waved through without a second glance, other times they wanted to verify in the computer that we were allowed to enter and we were stuck waiting for several minutes. We mostly used Ubers and Lyfts, and the drivers were frequently stuck at the gate waiting despite me calling ahead and letting them know to expect them. One night my husband and I came back around 1 am after a date night, and the guard gate was unmanned despite us knocking and calling, so our uber could not get into the complex. We had to get out and walk around the gate to get home, which completely defeats the purpose of having a guard gate in the first place!

HA_HOTELNAME: large home minutes from the strip!
Sentence: Sharp object on stair carpet cut bottom of child's foot.
Verbatim: We registered as a party of 10 and there was only placesettings for 10 and 5 chairs around the countertop (one was aside and broken). No canopener. Carpet upstairs dirtied our socks. Sharp object on stair carpet cut bottom of child’s foot. No directions on heating system—it was 77 degrees in morning and we couldn’t turn it down. Grill grates dirty from last use. Coffee filter had old grounds left in pit upon arrival.

HA_HOTELNAME: agave | fireplace | outdoor shower
Sentence: Think you should put adhesive on the bottom before someone slips and hurts themselves.
Verbatim: Enjoyed our stay. Would say the only negative was how slippery the tub was getting in and out. Think you should put adhesive on the bottom before someone slips and hurts themselves.

HA_HOTELNAME: cozy waterfront bungalow
Sentence: He got a deep puncture wound and was bleeding everywhere.
Verbatim:
I am sending in proof of an unsafe and dangerous home we rented from VRBO. I have proof that we had issues from the day we arrived on December 23, 2022. We were supposed to stay until January 2nd 2023. We arrived to find the back door broken and the kitchen full of snow and ice. Because the back door is broken the thermostat will not properly heat the home. The heat is escaping through the door. We immediately contacted the owner and she said she would send someone out on Monday and had no one for the next 3 nights because of Christmas. A space heater was dropped off for us and never offered to clean up the kitchen full of snow and ice or make a temporary fix for us till Monday. She refunded us $100 for inconvenience which did not even cover one night of our stay as we froze all weekend with 1 space heater and 2 floors in the home. On Saturday December 24,2022 my service animal fell down her stairs which are suspended hanging from ceiling with open wires. I will include pictures so you can understand the stairs and exposed wires. He got a deep puncture wound and was bleeding everywhere. We rushed him to the hospital on Christmas Eve which is where we spent Christmas. We drove 1500 miles to see family and could not. Notified the owner of the dangerous steps and situation and she did not respond. On Monday December 26, 2022 the contractor was promised to come out and fix door. A heating and cooling guy came because he was told by owner there was a gas leak. She NEVER told us about that. He said the door is broken and no contractor can fix it it needs a new door. I called VRBO and her immediately and no response till Tuesday December 27, 2022. She said she thought there was a gas leak weeks ago and had it checked. I asked her why would you send a guy back to check after you rented the home to double check for a gas leak? You should double check before you rent the home. Or notify us that it is possible and let us make decision whether or not we want to risk staying at the home. Never offered anything for the dog or how dangerous the steps are either but made sure to mention she paid a lot of money to have the steps built. We also lost WiFi. We rebooted the system several times to no avail. Called spectrum and they said NO OUTAGE in area the home has been disabled for private account reasons and the owner needs to call in.
